Summary: The room was very clean, bedding was comfortable, and the parking was convenient. We were able to park directly outside our room. We were within walking distance to Disney. We used the Denny’s voucher for breakfast ~ a very nice option.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The hotel was not the usual Best Western I expected, it was a bit older but the rooms were clean and comfy. I thought I was getting a hotel within walking distance to Disneyland. The description said a "2 block" walk.  Each block is almost a mile. Well maybe not that much but is wasn't a normal 2 blocks. However you can buy a bus pass (ART) and it picks you up and drops you off right at the hotel but you need to schedule it with "tripspot". We walked to the park in the morning but after walking around all day we took the bus back to the hotel in the evening.
Manager Response: none

Summary: My husband and I travelled to Anaheim so that we could explore Disneyland before we had kids, this was just what we needed the bed was really comfortable and it was a nice walk to the parks which made it easy to come back to the room when we needed a break and then head back over to the parks later in the day
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to tell us about your stay! We're so happy to hear our location was convenient for you. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: This place was amazing, our room was clean and tidy, the bed was super comfy, pillows were soft, had the best sleep after our long flight, staff were friendly and very welcoming, the laundry room was never busy so was good to catch up on washing, the pool and spa was a great temp, and was clean with towels provided in the vicinity, shops located next door super convenient, dennys breakfast was a plus with a short walk to downtown Disney, cannot fault this place, made lots of great memories staying here, my family and I will be staying here again ❤️
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to tell us about your stay! We appreciate your kind words vey much and we're so glad to have been a part of such a wonderful memory for your family. We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: We booked two Best Westerns this trip. Our second location was awful, for multiple  reasons.  My family and kept reminiscing and raving about this Anaheim location. About how awesome and nice the staff are and the quality of the rooms. I’ve already booked this hotel again for a last minute trip back to the area.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to tell us about your stay! We're so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. Your returning patronage is the highest compliment we can receive. We can't wait to see you again soon!

Summary: Expensive for what it is, close to the park. The Denny’s breakfast vouchers are nice to have.  They don’t clean the room daily because of Covid, not a problem though.  I’ve machine is placed close for service.

But looked like if you walked up the street you could walk into back of California  adventure. Check it first.  Plenty of other rest around but breakfast at Dennys covered by hotel was great.  Limited menu free but reasonable anyway

I will never book here again.

Summary: We were looking for a convenient place to stay the night before Disneyland.This was perfect! Clean, comfortable, convenient. And free parking and free breakfast at Dennys sealed the deal. We walked over to Downtown Disney for dinner the night before and were able to get to Disneyland when it opened the next day. Mission accomplished!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to tell us about your stay! We’re glad to hear you enjoyed our convenient location and fulfilling breakfast options.  We hope to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: Perfect location to the amusement parks
Summary: This hotel is situated on the far side of Downtown Disney and is a perfect starting point for the day. The Dennys next door isn't as busy as the location across from the main entrance so no long waits for breakfast. Less than a 5 minute walk away and you will be in a much smaller line for the security check. There is even a quick entry on the Disneyland monorail stop if your tickets are already in hand.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to tell us about your stay! We’re glad to hear you enjoyed our convenient location and fulfilling breakfast options.  We hope to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: Do you enjoy listening to other people?
Summary: Stay here if you don’t like rest or sleep.  First off the good points: 20 minutes walk to Disney quick check in a breakfast voucher for Denny’s next door for each morning of your stay.   Bad points….the walls are paper thin as are the doors and ceilings. I’m typing this as I lie here listening to kids running around, adults talking, people banging doors. I can even hear drawers being closed and it’s so loud they may as well come in to my room and close my drawers repeatedly next to my head. If they’re awake so is everyone else.   The rooms are brown, very brown. They need updating and modernising desperately. This is the only hotel that I’ve stayed in of my three week trip around the US where I’ve actually had to use my flip flops to walk around the room as I didn’t want to put

Summary: The hotel was comfortable, clean and a nice size room. The air conditioner was a little loud but that's something that can be fixed. Had a breakfast at Denny's which is right next door to walk to and that is included in the price. If you want to take the bus shuttle to Disneyland it is right in front or we did Uber and it was inexpensive and easy to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to tell us about your stay! We’re glad to hear you enjoyed our convenient location and fulfilling breakfast options.  We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Traveling with a family of 5 or 6?  The family suite here offered 1 king bed and 1 bathroom on one side of the room with a folding divider and the other side of teh room had 3 full size beds with 1 bathroom.  The rooms are spacious with plenty of room for luggage, Each area by the bathroom has a long counter with 1 sink, an air conditioner and one standing closet.  They gave us a voucher for two persons to eat breakfast at Denny's next door, which we didn't use due to having reservations in Disneyland, but it is a nice feature.    The property is older and could use some updating.  The pool was clean and nice for a dip while the heat wave was going on.  The front desk manager was very friendly and the value for the room was great.  It's quite a walk to Disney entrance - we got

Summary: 3 times we have stayed in this area and 3 times in this hotel. Like it here and will stay here again next time we're back.   Has all we need, close to where we need to go and everyone friendly. It was good to stay here again. Until next time.   Thanks for another nice stay

Summary: We stayed here for 4 nights in July. We were pleasantly surprised how nice it was - the hotel is slightly older but it felt clean, very well-maintained and safe. We enjoyed the pool and gym. All the staff we spoke to were very friendly.  It was a great bonus that they provided vouchers for complimentary breakfast at the Denny’s next door. This was a great treat and nice start to each day. They also offered bags with snacks for breakfast. We found it an easy walk to Disneyland. We would definitely recommend this as a great place to stay and good value especially with the Denny vouchers. It was a great start to our road trip in America.

When we arrived the parking lot was being resurfaced, a fact undisclosed in our reservation materials. We were assured that they were almost done... Right. The room was clean, has a fridge  and standard bathroom. We only stayed at the hotel to sleep. I would recommend this place to stay for those who want to be close to the hotel. We also got breakfast vouchers to Dennys next door. They are printed with the dates on them so make sure you take the correct day when you go eat.

Plus we had received 4 free Dennys breakfast vouchers that I didn't know about. That was cool! And the breakfast was bomb! Worth the price to stay here. Walking distance to Disneyland.

Summary: Thank you for our joining rooms. Rooms were very clean. We had a wonderful time visiting Disney land. You made our stay so comfortable 💖. Beds were comfortable and everything we needed for our vacation stay. Hope to be back soon again.

Summary: Roaches! No services because of covid. Or so they say. Fitness center is closed because of covid or so they say. Lazy staff unprofessional front desk ask for new sheets ddnt get any. I will never deliberately stay there again.

Summary Heading: Great place to stay by Disneyland/Anaheim Convention Center!
Summary: We have only stayed at Pavilions for all of our Disneyland/Convention Center trips for the past 6 years! We love the location, the hotel is always clean and the beds are comfortable. The ART picks up nearby and it’s not an awful walk if you prefer to do that. It’s a great value and we love that they offer free breakfast every day at Denny’s as well! I highly recommend this hotel!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Clean room and close to Disneyland
Summary: I arrived early on a Friday, and they actually had a room ready for me (I did the advanced check-in, which I think made the difference). Really appreciated this, so I could drop my stuff off before walking to Disneyland. I walk fast but was at the entrance to Disneyland California Adventure in 20 minutes. Super easy and convenient. One thing to note: ask for a room upstairs just in case a herd of elephants is staying above you, which was the case for me. Not the hotel's fault, but just keep this in mind if you're a light sleeper or if loud footsteps will keep you up.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Easily walkable to Disneyland as long as you don’t get lost like I did 😂 Exactly what I expected from a Best Western. Really enjoyed the free parking and the Denny’s voucher for breakfast! Overall, will definitely stay again next time I go to Disneyland!
Manager Response: none

Summary: We stayed for Disneyland & it was a short walk to downtown Disney & easy to find. Parking was easy & safe. We loved that the hot tub was open late since our feet hurt after the park. The room needs to be updated in my opinion, the bed is a spring bed & we could feel each spring when laying down, and the room smelled old. But overall, it was an easy stay and the room was clean.  Also the AC unit has a very loud hum to it- so I’d suggest headphones in the summer.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Pros: Hotel gives you free Denny’s Voucher for breakfast. Shuttle to Disney at affordable cost. 2 minute walk to the Disney shuttle. Free hotel parking. Clean rooms. Friendly staff and staff had great customer service  Cons: Very thin walls so you can hear everything outside. The rooms stay humid. Room smelled like old people
Manager Response: none

Summary: The hotel needed a bit of updating as far as the rooms go especially the sound proofing, we heard all are neighbors and heavy walking above.    It was nice that they had a laundry room for guests.  The hotel grounds were great, pool area lovely, and ART transportation to Disneyland was close by. The Denny's breakfast included was a plus.   Unfortunately the noise level from guests nearby is enough to keep us away next time or ask for a room with no neighbors.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Still a great place to stay
Summary: Been a couple of years since I was here, and has the same old feel to it!  Still a clean property, easily located to most major activities and offering free and available parking! A score among the Stovall's Inns, most of which charge for parking and can be really challenging at times.  This place also still offers a complimentary breakfast at Denny's next door, featuring 3 items and a juice, from 6am to 10am. A great way to start the day, and better than any hotel breakfast I have ever experienced - more so now that COVID has destroyed most of those as well for the time being.  Once downside this visit is that housekeeping does not service the rooms, and if you need something like clean towels you need to call up front. I am not sure why, honestly, as the Best Western I stayed
Manager Response: none

Summary: My experience staying at this hotel was great. It was convenient, the rooms were nice, as well as the location. It’s at least 6 min drive from Disneyland. You can also see the fireworks from this hotel which was - plus! The only thing I have to say is that there was a small odor in the room and the fridge had a really bad odor. Other than that, the bed was comfortable and our experience was great.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great place to stay if visiting Disneyland
Summary: I understand that things are just starting to open up after Covid lockdown, and difficult to get accurate information on "how" things are modified with reopening, so staff is learning too.  Difficult to contact and figure the schedule for the ART buses to Disneyland.  What made the stay best, was the helpfulness of the staff to accommodate, especially, Kelly at the front desk. She made multiple calls to the bus company, which also gave her inconsistent info, but she was extremely helpful to make sure we had the correct info. Bus pick up for Disneyland is right next to hotel.  Older motel, but well maintained.  Unfortunately with Covid rules NO daily housekeeping.  Also a breakfast voucher was given for Denny's right nest door which was great.  Pool and spa great to come back to
Manager Response: none

Summary: This hotel is good quality and affordable. To be honest I wasn't sure what to expect, especially when we pulled in and I realized it was "motel-style" (doors lead right to the parking lot). But we were very pleased with our experience. It was CLEAN and quiet, the staff is friendly, beds are good, and it's walkable to Disney. Breakfast at Denny's was way better than what you get for breakfast at most hotels. My adult daughter and I stayed for a few nights while visiting Disney. The room was perfect for the two of us. It might feel a little cramped for a family of four with teenagers. I recommend it and I would stay here again.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Where we always choose to stay!
Summary: We prefer to stay at BW Plus Pavillions when visiting SoCal  because: Great location near Disneyland; all freeway access within minutes of hotel; the great customer service and the rooms are always clean!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Well Located - Fab Beds & Walking Distance to Disney Downtown
Summary: We had a 4 night stay here in February and it's a little gem. Totally value for money - the inclusive breakfast at the adjacent Denny's is a bonus and a great way to start your day before hitting the madness of Disney. The hotel has comfy beds and pillows and is surprisingly quiet - although having a ground floor room can have disadvantages if the people above you decide to be elephantine in their movements! The site is about 1/2 a mile from the entrance to Downtown Disney (so approx 15 mins walk), and there is also the bus service which takes you to the main transport interchange should you want to us that as an option - you can purchase a 3 day hopper ticket from the hotel reception as well - we used those on a couple of days just to save our tired feet. We were a bit
Manager Response: none

Summary: This motel looks a little on the old side from the outside but the rooms are quite nice.  The bathroom tile was obviously new and the room looked in great shape.  The check in staff was really nice and the hotel had plenty of parking.  It is a little far from the entrance of the park so it is a bit of a walk.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay and for taking the time to provide us with feedback. We are glad you enjoyed our amenities and our service. We look forward to your next visit to Anaheim.

Summary: I was very surprised how much I enjoyed this hotel! Beds were super comfortable and clean.  Front desk was very helpful and quick at check in.  Breakfast vouchers for Denny's was great! My kids were happy to eat there each morning.  Only negative is the voucher is only good for 2 people per room even though 4 people (2 adults 2 kids) were staying.  Also could only use the voucher starting 630AM. We wanted to eat earlier to get to park earlier but Denny's was strict on the time and wouldn't let us order till 630 on the dot.  I did also appreciate this hotel didn't charge for parking and there was plenty of spaces. We took the ART transportation to the parks,  the bus stop was right outside. It was super convenient!
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay and for taking the time to provide us with feedback. We are glad you enjoyed our breakfast options and our service. We look forward to your next visit to Anaheim.

Summary: We are DVC members and are very used  to staying at a Disney Resort. This time we did not have any points and were very hesitant to stay here.  We were very pleased!  The staff was nice and accommodating.  The rooms were huge and very clean.  The outside color (avocado green) was sort of a bummer but otherwise it was very nice.  It was an easy walk (but a little complicated, to Disney Land).  I wish Anaheim had better signage (obviously not a hotel issue).  The shuttle was good too.  It was only $6 and was a quick trip to the parks.  Leaving the parks though, it took my husband and I longer to catch the shuttle and get back to the hotel than it took the rest of my party to walk back.  Overall, I was very happy with this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay and for taking the time to provide us with feedback. We are glad you enjoyed our service and our location. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Best Western hotels are always great price for the quality. This location is great next to both Disney and the Anaheim Convention Center. Instead of hot breakfast with the hotel, they offer vouchers with Denny’s which is conveniently located in the parking lot. We usually only stay at 5 star big name hotels/resorts, but didn't want to spend the money for this quick one night trip. I was really impressed with how nice this hotel was considering the price. I would stay again and perhaps try other best westerns in the future.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The room was clean and comfortable.  Having cable and Wi-Fi was great.  The pool and spa were clean, and towels were available in the pool area.  Great place to relax and unwind from the busy day.  The staff was nice and accommodating.  The location was perfect.  Everything was in walking distance.  It was a great experience for me and the kids.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay and for taking the time to leave us your comments. We appreciate your feed back and hope that we may see you on your next visit to Anaheim!

Summary: My sister and I stayed there when we went to Disney and universal studios.  Service was good and property was well maintained.  We did have an issue with the beds being incredibly hard.  Pretty tough on 2 middle aged women for 6 days but overall it was clean and convenient.  Housekeeping did an excellent job on our rooms.  Very clean.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We always keep coming back to the same hotel.  It's close to Disneyland and California Park. The shuttle bus to Disneyland is out side the hotel office.  Just make sure check out the room before unpacking my husband cut his foot with broken glass
Manager Response: none

Summary: My husband & I stayed at this hotel because we attended Expowest Food Show at The Convention Center. We always try to stay at a Best Western Hotel whenever possible & when we attend the food show we try to stay within walking distance of the convention Center. Everything at the hotel was great except for the refridgerator, it was making a weird noise, it sounded like Darth Vader breathing. We didn't report it to the front desk we just shut it off once we figured out where the noise was coming from. If your going to Disneyland or The Convention Center it's close to both and a great place to stay, I would recommed this hotel!
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay and for taking the time to leave us your comments. We appreciate you business and look forward to any future visits to Anaheim.

Summary: Good value. Rooms were clean but in desperate need of an update. Quite location. Very good breakfast options. Great shuttle service from ART, to and from Disneyland and California Adventure Resorts. Staff was very helpful.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and for providing us with your feed back. We are pleased to note that we have recently started renovating our rooms and hope you would consider coming back in the near future to enjoy a newly renovated room.

Summary Heading: Rooms are fine but the ceilings are paper thin.
Summary: We booked our stay based on the excellent reviews. The location is excellent if you are visiting Downtown Disney, and the rooms are spacious with good beds. Our room was a little 'tired' but the hotel appears to be undergoing major renovations on their rooms.  However the ceilings are paper thin and you can hear everything from the room above you. So much so that I feel like telling the women in the room near us that her child will not need the jacket that she has told her to take three times!   If you stay on the second floor this is a reasonable hotel in an excellent location at a reasonable price.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Awesome hotel. Super close to Disneyland. Right on the shuttle line. Dennys breakfast was awesome everyday. The pool and hot tub were both wonderful. The staff were super helpful. Would definently stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay with us and for taking the time to leave us your comments. We appreciate your feed back and hope to see you on your next visit to Anaheim!

Summary: Always a pleasant stay at any of the Best Western Plus properties!!!!! They go above and beyond to make you feel like your at your home away from home! Rooms are always clean and comfy! Best Western is the way to go!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us.

Summary: Was a very pleasant experience for all.  Would like to recommend a breakfast  buffet for guest.  We enjoyed our stay and look forward to another in the near future! Thank you for your hospitality!  God bless
Manager Response: none

Summary: Our church paid for three people to attend the Religious Education Congress at the convention center.  The hotel is excellent.  Clean, not the highest price and located next to the ART bus stop.  The walk to the convention center is  easy.  The hot tub and pool were clean and in good working order.  The only problem we had was trying to use the visa gift cards to pay for the room.  I had to use a personal credit card to pay for this parish church event.  The Denny's breakfast was excellent.  The Liquor Market next door was great to have available to purchase lunch. The Mexican dinner next door was way out of line.  The cost for three people was $97.00.  We will never go there again.  The Italian dinner food was good and the price was right.  Thank you.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Room was clean and well lit. I did find the bed a little on the hard side, but I managed. I had my own toiletries and towels so I did not use your towels. Other than that I would definitely come again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: From the moment we walked in the experience that this hotel gave us was above what is expected. We were early checking in and the room we had booked was already for us and the staff were happy for us to check in early and everything was so clean and tidy. Amazing service.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This is the first time we stayed here, will be back for sure. Staff are great. You get a free breakfast next door at Denny's for 2. Close to DisneyLand. We walked to down town Disney from our hotel, took a round 10 minutes. Very quiet. Rooms are very comfortable and clean.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We stay here because it meets our needs. There is a hot breakfast, we feel safe, there is no parking fee and the spaces are not too tight. The rooms are decent with good beds. The housekeepers are the best! The park is easily accessible and we can walk there is about 20 minutes. Generally the front desk staff is nice, Housekeeping staff is great and our room is always cleaned whenever we want. We look forward to staying there because we haven't had to deal with too many problems, or a bunch of rude employees. All of the employees on our last visit knew about customer service!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Pros-value, free parking, a voucher for 2 at Denny's (selected menu)   Cons-15 to 20min walk, we had to cut through the employee parking lot and go through downtown Disney. The free breakfast voucher is only for 2.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay and for taking the time to leave us your comments.

Summary: Very clean hotel from front to back.  Nice pool with Jacuzzi.  Good exercise equipment.  Everything works well. Courteous staff.  Pretty neighborhood.  You must walk a bit to get to the Disneyland entrance - but you're supposed to walk at Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay and for taking the time to leave us your comments. We hope to see you on your next visit to Anaheim!

Summary: We stayed here for 3 nights and had 2 rooms booked. It was very clean and peaceful so we got a good night sleep after a long haul flight. The free breakfast at Dennys was excellent although we only got 4 free and there were 5 of us. Learnt the difference between sunny side up and over easy eggs. The staff were helpful and friendly.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay

Summary: Older hotel that is well maintained.  Voucher for limited selection at Denny's which was good for us. Free parking. My computer had issue with WIFI security certificate. My husband did not. ART to park outside for a dollar a trip or five dollars a day. Staff was friendly and helpful. Overall good  value.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay at our property. Your business is very important to us and we value your feedback. By telling us what you liked about your stay and how we can improve, you are helping us deliver a superior experience for you and other guests in the future. We hope you will come back and see us again soon.

Summary Heading: Don't stay here if you like sleeping well at night
Summary: Compared to everything in its vicinity, BWP Pavilions seems to offer great value. Our room was clean, decently furnished, and included a mini-fridge, a microwave, and free tea/coffee. It also included daily breakfast at Denny's, but you can only order three things from a very limited menu of super basic items. For example, you could get 2 eggs, bacon, and hashbrowns, plus a coffee/tea. That's it. Anything else you wanted would be extra. That's not bad, but we expected more when the hotel advertises "free hot breakfast".   All that aside, the main problem with this property is with how thin the walls are to each room. You're basically in a motel style property where each room has a door to the parking lot. You can hear everything in the rooms next door, and you can hear
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to leave us your comments and for your recent stay. We are pleased to hear that you were happy with our customer service. By telling us what you liked about your stay and how we can improve, you are helping us deliver a superior experience for you and other guests in the future. We hope you will come back and see us again soon.

Summary: Great service, love the complimentary breakfast coupon for Denny's on site. Comfortable room with the added amenities of microwave and fridge.  price for the rooms was worth it for this business trip close to the convention center only a 5 minute walk daily to show.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay and for taking the time to leave us your comments. We are pleased to hear you found our hotel to be a good fit for your Anaheim business trip.

Summary Heading: Really a great value for the room and location
Summary: This is our second stay at this location and it's great if your going to Disneyland!!! My family really enjoyed it and the bedding was amazing. It's not that long a walk to downtown Disney and a great location for food outside the park. Very fast and friendly service as well! Will definitely stay again!

Summary: Great value. We have stayed here many times because of the clean room, comfortable beds, and close walk to Disneyland. I would recommend this hotel to anyone that wants a quiet place to sleep, great service and overall good value.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and for taking the time to leave us your comments. Your business is very important to us and by leaving us your comments you are helping us deliver a superior experience for you and other guests in the future. We look forward having you stay with us again!

Summary: Professional in every way.  I stayed 3 nights at one Best Western then one more night at another.  The level of professionalism never waned.  I will check the Best Western Plus Pavilions first, Best Western Stovals next, then an any other nearby Hotels for accommodations in the future.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay at our property. Your business is very important to us and we value your feedback. We hope you will come back and see us again soon.

Summary: This was our second time at this Best Western. We booked the family suite, which was very convenient. 1 king and 3 double beds, plus 2 bathrooms made for a comfortable stay. I was pleasantly surprised to find that there was an accordion door that separates the room. Since my Daughter,Son in law and Granddaughter were using the side with the King bed, it made it much easier for them to get my granddaughter to sleep . The room was really spacious, and in the corner so there is no foot traffic going past.  There are two outside doors, one to each side of the room. That's a plus if someone is coming up late. Some furniture didn't seem as updated as the last room we stayed in, but it was clean, the beds looked fairly new and it was comfortable. Everything was in good working order.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay and for taking the time to leave us your comments. We are pleased to hear that you and your family enjoyed our sweet and that it was accommodating. We look forward to your next visit in Anaheim!

Summary: Hotel was older, but had been updated.  Check-in was easy.  Room was clean and spacious.  Breakfast voucher was given to use at Denny's which shares the same parking lot.  Found it to be better than other BW hotel breakfasts.  Only fifteen minute walk to Disneyland or you can take ART shuttle for $5.00/day.  We walked and returned after midnight and felt safe walking down the street and in hotel parking lot.  Several other restaurants close.  Nothing fancy, but a good value for the price.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to leave us your comments and for staying with our hotel. We are glad that you found our property and amenities a good fit for your Disneyland vacation. We hope that you may stay with us again!

Summary Heading: Great Place to stay near Disneyland, Good Value
Summary: Stayed here with my family in January 2017.  Hotel was close to Disney Resort (Just a walk across Employee parking lot).  Safe neighborhood, comfortable beds, quiet and convenient.  Hotel room was clean and up to the Best Western standard.  Also the winter AAA rate was very reasonable for the area. We used the breakfast vouchers at the Denny's next door.  We received good service there as well.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to leave us your thoughts. We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay and we hope to see you on your next visit to Anaheim.

Summary: My wife and I stayed here recently while doing a RunDisney event at Disneyland. The location was great since it is within walking distance to the park. The staff was also very nice and helpful. The room wasn't newly updated, but it didn't need to be since we spent very little time at the hotel. It was very clean though. The hotel also included vouchers for breakfast at the Denny's next door.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and we are please to hear you enjoyed your stay. We hope to see you for future Disney races!

Summary: Stayed here due to the proximity of the parks.  Easy access to the parks and where we needed to go for our race.  Had a great experience from the time we checked in until the time we checked out.  We went to breakfast around 9:30am and by the time we got back our room was already cleaned!  Excellent staff.  I will be staying here for all my other half marathons or park trips.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Location is great & the rest Average
Summary: There is nothing actually wrong with this place.  You get what you pay for.  The room is average with noise about the same as any cheap hotel.  The office staff does just what it needs to do with nothing above the norm offered.  Having a Denny's next door is handy and the bus stop out front for Disney is very convenient.  All in all this falls into the category of just fine and average.
Manager Response: We appreciate your feedback from your survey and we will be looking into your grievances.

Summary: The staff at this resort are the best ever.  They are so helpful and friendly.  If a problem occurs it is taken care of immediately. They are a class act. The restaurant we were provided breakfast was exceptional as far as service, quality and speed.  The rooms were clean and comfortable.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time and taking our survey. We appreciate the compliment and we hope to see you again soon for future reservations.

Summary Heading: Clean, inexpensive, friendly staff, close walk to Disneyland.
Summary: Clean, inexpensive, friendly staff and a close walk to Disneyland.  Bring your own pillow because theirs are hard and small.  Avoid the apples in their complementary snack bag. Yuck. Otherwise a good value.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking our survey. We will be looking into your grievances and will make improvements for the future.

Summary: Great place to stay.  Very clean.  Staff was very friendly and helpful.  The room was perfect for us.  Coffee, tea and hot cocoa in room with fridge and microwave.  Very comfortable beds and large screen HD tv with free movies on demand!  Breakfast was provided with vouchers for Denny's next door.  Great way to start before the day at Disneyland.  The distance was great with about a 10 to 15 minute walk to the gates.  Will definitely use this as our hotel stay for Disney trips!!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking our survey. We are glad to hear that you enjoyed our HBO channels and our vouchers to Denny's. We hope to see you soon for your next Disney trip.

Summary Heading: Good value within walking distance of the parks
Summary: Big pluses include good value rooms, pool area, free wifi, free parking and allowance for standard breakfast items at Denny's. Rooms appear to recently updated (tubs removed and showers installed) with good quality linens and mattresses. Rooms are quiet except you can hear the nightly Disneyland fireworks. Pool area is appealing but lacks a little ambiance (in the parking lot) and includes towels and the hot tub is a welcome treat for theme park weary legs. Room price included three-item and beverage allowance for breakfast at neighboring Denny's with option to pay the difference for add on items. One small negative is the lack of an in-room safe.  Yes you can walk to the theme parks. It is 15-20 minutes if you cut through the Grand Californian hotel. The Anaheim Resort
Manager Response: Thank you for taking our survey. We do apologize for the inconvenience that the ART bus may have given you. The majority of the time the bus is punctual with it's every twenty minutes on the hour arrivals. We hope you enjoyed your trip and we hope that you will plan any future vacations to Disneyland or California Adventure with us.

Summary: Pretty near to Disneyland. Either 15 walk or pay $5/adult or $2/child to take the ART shuttle to Disneyland. Free parking and Complimentary breakfast for 2 from Denny's is also a plus point.  Rooms are clean. Housekeeping staffs were very efficient.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking our survey. We are glad you enjoyed your stay and your trip to Disneyland. We hope you consider staying with us in the future.

Summary Heading: Excellent Hotel near Disneyland with Free Parking
Summary: Hotel is old (like all the nearby hotels) but rooms have been refurbished nicely.  Free parking is an advantage for this location that is so close to Disneyland.  Can get to nearby cities easily like Anaheim and Knots Berry Farm.  Nightly rate can change significantly from day-to-day.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking our survey. We are glad you enjoyed our newly refurbished rooms. We hope that you plan any future trips to Knott's Berry Farm and Disneyland with us.

Summary Heading: Review from a travel agent... For my thrifty travelers
Summary: This is truly a great value for Disney goers or convention attendees!!! Proximity to both venues is a short walk. Options for restaurants are walking next door to Denny's or Marri's Italian Restarant (excellent local place!) Heated pool and hot tub always clean. The included breakfast at Denny's is s great bonus this time around! I hope the owner continues this!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for giving us a review. We hope that you and your customers will make future reservations with us.

Summary: Breakfast at Denny's vouchers AND grab n go breakfast options. 15min walk to downtown Disney through employee parking lot. Staff is very nice and helpful! We will definitely be staying again when we come back for Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking our survey. We are glad you enjoyed your stay and took advantage of our Denny's vouchers, which feed two people per day. We hope you come back and visit us soon.

Summary Heading: Pleasant stay for last minute overnight
Summary: Another great area BW Plus hotel! The breakfast is actually at Denny's, practically in the same parking lot.  Nice selection of items in the included hotel breakfast offering.  Bit of a walk if you have small children and not very heavily traveled in the late hours.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking our survey. We are glad you enjoyed our selection over at Denny's and we hope you consider us for your future reservations.

Summary: I was apprehensive about staying at this property.  But the price was right for a family Disney trip.  It was better than expected.  Rooms were very clean, beds comfortable.  You can tell they have tried to do some upgrades to the rooms.  Breakfast at Denny's was a huge plus. Reviews were right walls are thin, heard up stairs and neighbors with earplugs.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to take our survey. We are looking into your grievances and we hope you consider us for future trips.

Summary: We love this hotel for its great location and stay here at least once a year. In the past they had a sparse breakfast assortment, and then last year none at all. This year they offered coupons for the Denny's next door for a 3 item breakfast at no charge. It was just enough to get our day started on the right foot. The staff was excellent and called our room a few minutes after we got in to see if we needed anything. So thoughtful.  We were extremely happy with our stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking our survey. We are glad to hear that you enjoyed our Denny's voucher breakfast and we hope you plan your next vacation with us.

Summary: Rooms were clean, nice, beds were comfortable for the price and location you can't beat it. Walk to Disneyland was only 15 minutes. Staff was friendly and helpful. Free parking is what made me originally choose this location.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking our survey. We are glad you enjoyed your stay and we hope you visit us again for future reservations.

Summary Heading: Short stay but over all a great stay at this hotel
Summary: Very happy with our stay this time is was only for one day but last month we stayed 2 days and were very pleased with both our short family vacation trips.  The rooms with accommodating and very nice and clean
Manager Response: Thank you for taking our survey. We are glad you enjoyed both of your short family vacations with us. We hope that you plan your next stay with us again.

Summary: The check in staff at night were very helpful.  The room was clean and comfortable.  Close to the Disneyland resort the price was quite reasonable since we booked it early.  There were nearby restaurants for dining and the location was very easy to enter into and leave.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking our survey. We are glad you enjoyed your stay and we hope you plan your next trip to Disneyland with us.

Summary: wanted a hotel close to disney, which it was, they have shuttle service to the park for 5 bucks a person,  checked in but couldnt get the key because room wasnt ready, which was no biggie we were headed to disney anyways, but the girl at front desk gave me my parking pass so i could park there,  got to the hotel late around midnight, the evening staff was really nice, he gave us the keys and we headed to the room, nice and clean, very quite, comfy beds, will stay here again when i go back to disney. and you get a coupon to dennys which is right next door for 2 free breakfasts, available from 7am to 10am,
Manager Response: Thank you for taking our survey. We are glad to hear our staff was friendly and they accommodated for your early check-in and receiving of a parking pass for you can park while we finished preparing your room. We are looking forward to your next trip to Disneyland to visit us.

Summary: We stayed here for 4 nights in October for my daughter's birthday Disney trip. It was affordable, the staff were very helpful and professional, and close to Disney. Across the street is the Disney employee parking lot. You can walk through there and be in downtown Disney in 10 minutes. The ART bus also passes by the front of the hotel every 20-30 minutes and you can buy passes at the desk. For the proximity to Disney, price, and service you can not beat it!
Manager Response: Thank you for the five star rating! We appreciate you taking the time and taking our survey. We hope your daughter enjoyed her birthday trip and you will consider us again for her birthday celebrations for next year.

Summary: This is an older stile hotel (all doors are to outside) but has been updated and the rooms were clean and comfortable. The location is great! It is just across the street from the employee parking lot which you can walk through and enter into Downtown Disney and go straight to Disneyland and California Adventure. The walk takes about 5 to 10 minutes. The parking was free and the breakfast is by a coupon to eat at the Denny's next door, which is a plus over the normal BW breakfast. When booking this hotel the only room that was available was a king suite. When we checked in an when to the room it was huge! It had 4 beds and 2 bathrooms. It appeared to be two rooms that were combined. Way too much for the 2 of us. We returned to the desk and Candy was able to assign us another
Manager Response: Thank you for taking our survey. We believe you may have been put into our suite. Our suite is two rooms combined for big groups that could sleep six people comfortably. Our king rooms have one king size bed in them. We are glad to hear that Candy was so helpful and moved you to a smaller room and saved you both some money. Thank you again for taking our survey and we hope to see you again soon.

Summary Heading: A nice neat hotel with good access to Disneyland
Summary: The hotel is a little old, but is well maintained and clean. The staff are very friendly and welcoming. The rooms are small and look a little dated, but for a few days stay they are adequate.  There us a shuttle bus to take you to Disneyland that stops out the front and cost only a few dollars return.  There is a nice swimming pool and a heated spa to relax in after a hard day at the Disneyland. The hotel has a Dennys next door and provided free vouchers for guests to eat breakfast  free.
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to take our survey. We are glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay and relaxed at our spa and swimming pool. We are glad you enjoyed the vouchers over at Denny's and hope you remember us for your next visit down to Disneyland.

Summary: We were pleasantly surprised with this hotel.  The room was clean, the beds were very comfortable.  It is right across the street from Disneyland.  Still a bit of a walk so we took ART transit to the main gate.  The free Dennys breakfast was nice, we had a great server every morning.  Easy parking, no extra fees.  Nice pool and hot tub.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time and taking our survey. We take pride in our cleanliness and comfortable bedrooms. We are glad you took advantage of the ART bus that picks up every twenty minutes in front of our hotel. We hope you come back and visit us again on your next trip down to Disneyland.

Summary: The room was clean and ready early which was perfect and very appreciated after our long drive since 5:00 a.m. The beds were very comfortable, we slept very well. I am a restless sleeper away from home, but the beds & linens were so comfy, I slept great. Location to Disneyland/Disney's California Adventure was a comfortable walking distance; while we could have used the local trolley/bus, by the time you add stops, etc., you're there in 10 min if you walk. The Continental Breakfast was FANTASTIC. There was something for everyone. It was wonderful.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking our survey. We are glad you enjoyed your stay at possibly one of our sister properties. We  have a fantastic breakfast over at Denny's, however do not have a continental breakfast at this property. We hope you enjoyed your stay and hope you come back soon to visit us.

Summary Heading: Great location for Disney, friendly staff
Summary: We stayed here as we needed somewhere close to Disney. You can walk to the Disney parks and downtown Disney within 10  minutes, you just walk straight across the Disney hotel car park. The staff here were really friendly. You got complimentary tickets for breakfast at Denny's diner which you couldn't fault, the pancakes were yummy! It's also next to a convenience store and Italian restaurant. Rooms were nice, a bit dated but clean and comfy. If you're going to Disney I would definitely recommend staying here!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time and completing our survey. We are happy to hear that you took advantage of our vouchers for Denny's and  enjoyed the pancakes. We hope to have you come visit us again on your next trip to Disney.

Summary: Stayed for 3 nights on a trip to Disneyland.  This hotel was perfect for our stay - just a short walk across the carpark into downtown Disney and meal vouchers provided for Breakfast at Denny's next door. Staff were friendly and accommodating.  I would recommend requesting a room on the second floor - we stayed on the first floor and were awoken each morning by heavy footsteps.  Otherwise the rooms were clean and updated.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time and completing our survey. We appreciate the feedback and will look into bettering your stay for your next trip. We hope you enjoyed your trip to Disneyland and look forward to having you visit us again for future trips.

Summary: It was a quick walk across the parking lot to Disney. There was a good selection of restaurants to eat at and the pool was small but good. The kids really enjoyed it. The air conditioner kept our room cool and we could watch the fireworks from the balcony. The front desk staff helped by calling if we needed transportation and also gave us great recommendations if asked.
Manager Response: Thank you for completing our survey. We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed our pool and that our staff was helpful towards finding needed transportation.   We look forward to having you visit us again for your future trips to Disneyland.

Summary: Very close to Disneyland, walking distance within 1.5 miles, 30 minute walk.  Great food places like TIffy's Restaurant and Coco's about a block down.  Adjacent to the hotel is Denny's Restaurant.  Workers were polite and excellent service.  Accessible shuttles daily to and from Disneyland ART Bus #9.   Inexpensive, round trip $5 all day pass but if you buy a 3-day pass for $12, you save $3.
Manager Response: Thank you for completing the survey regarding your recent stay at our property. Your business is very important to us and we value your feedback. We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed our hotel and our surrounding area. We hope you will come back and see us again soon.

Summary: We had a great experience staying at Best Western Pavilions! We stayed for 3 nights last year, and things have changed for the better! The 2 person meal vouchers were a great addition - we used them every day! We did get a little tired of the breakfast items, but it was free, so can't complain too much! The hotel staff was great and very accommodating. We were allowed to check in 1.5 hours early and check out about an hour late, which were both super helpful! Our sink was not draining when we checked in, but they fixed it by the time we got back from dinner! The hotel rooms are basic, but were perfect for what we needed, especially compared to the cost of other hotels in the area. It was great to have the hot tub, however, they don't monitor it much. We left several times
Manager Response: Thank you for completing the survey regarding your recent stay at our property. Your business is very important to us and we value your feedback. By telling us what you liked about your stay and how we can improve, you are helping us deliver a superior experience for you and other guests in the future. We hope you will come back and see us again soon.

Summary: Great location! Across the street from Disneyland. Take a shortcut through the Disney Cast parking lot (15 mins walk) to Disneyland. Staff and work crew were pleasant and professional. Summary: We have stayed at this BW 4 times now and it has always lived up to our expectations. The staff has always been friendly and helpful with all our questions. You get a voucher for a free breakfast at the Denny's next door which makes breakfast very pleasant. We would recommend this BW for anyone in the area for the local attractions
Manager Response: Thank you for completing the survey regarding your recent stay at our property. Your business is very important to us and we value your feedback. We hope you will come back and see us again soon.  Thank you again for taking the time to complete the survey. We appreciate your loyalty to our brand.

We had a room on the ground floor and were able to find a parking space close by. The room was clean and the AC unit kept it cool during the night so we were able sleep soundly. We heard some muffled noise from the adjoining rooms but not enough to bother us or keep us awake. Parking is also free at this hotel which I understand is not the case at the other nearby Best Western

Summary: We spent two nights here for our trip to Disneyland and the accommodations were just what we needed. The rooms were updated and very clean. The staff was very nice including the gentleman from maintenance who had to show me how to turn on the shower (it had been a very long day). If I find myself back in Anaheim I would happily stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay with us at the Best Western Plus Pavilions.  I am happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us and our staff was helpful.  We hope to see you on future trips to the Anaheim area.  Thank you again.

Summary: Room was clean, nicely decorated and comfortable. Quite, Denny's right next door. Large room, nice amenities. Very convenient location.  Found that I got a good nights sleep in this room. The staff was very pleasant and accommodating.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay with us at the Best Western Plus Pavilions.  We are thrilled you found our location and staff helpful during your stay.  Our Housekeeping Staff takes great pride in their work and our rooms show for it.  We hope to see you on future trips to the Anaheim area and thank you again.

Summary: Close to Disney. Denny's in parking lot. Room was clean with comfortable bed and great TV. Plenty of parking. Very quiet.Refrigerator and coffee maker in room.  Grab and go  breakfast ,yogurt, packaged muffins. A very good value hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay with us at the Best Western Plus Pavilions.  Our Housekeeping Staff takes great pride in their work and our rooms show for it.  I am pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay and look forward to seeing you on future trips to the Anaheim area.  Thank you again.

Summary: Really convenient for Disneyland, which is why they can get away with charging 3 1/2 star prices for a 1 1/2 star hotel. The staff were very pleasant and helpful. The room was dark and dingy, the bathroom was dormitory quality, the air conditioner operated at about 100 decibels. Our room was on the second floor and I didn't see an elevator. We had one day for Disney, so arrived after dinner the night before, were out the door at 8am, and didn't return until 11:30 that night, so basically all we did was sleep and shower in the room, and we would not have wanted to spend any more time there than necessary.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay with us at the Best Western Plus Pavilions.  I am sorry to hear we did not exceed your expectations.  If you would like to discuss any concerns please contact us directly at 714-776-0140.  Thank you.

Summary: The rooms at this best western are spacious but they are a little bit outdated . We've stayed here before for Disneyland trips and the easiest walk to the park is probably about 15 minutes through the entrance at Downtown Disney . There is plenty of parking at this hotel and the front desk is always helpful . Staying here you're away from the busy traffic over on Harbor Blvd . There is a Denny's right next to the hotel that is never too busy . Overall this is a great hotel and you don't feel rushed to beat any crowds .
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay with us at the Best Western Plus Pavilions.  We are pleased to hear you found our location and staff helpful during your stay and you enjoyed the hotel.  We look forward to seeing you on future trips to the Anaheim area and once again Thank you.

Summary: We stayed here while going to Disneyland.  Tram to Disney is only $5/day and picks you up right in front of the hotel.  Pool area was clean.  Beds were comfy.  We slept great!  My only complaint was the breakfast and coffee selection.  They only offered packaged muffins, granola bars, yogurt, and apples.  Coffee creamer was packets of powder.  At least offer liquid and flavored creamer!
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay with us at the Best Western Plus Pavilions.  We are thrilled you found our hotel and location helpful during your stay.  We look forward to seeing you on future trips to the Anaheim area.  Thank you again.

Summary: We were traveling with 3 young adult grandchildren.  The suite we reserved had a king and 3 double beds.  It was perfect for our group.  The rooms were clean.  The lobby area appeared to have been recently updated and offered fruit, cereal bars, yogurt and coffee in the morning.  The rooms were spacious and clean.  The only negative comment that I would have was the carpet appeared to be dated and it was rather dark.  We would stay there again if traveling with a family group.  It was the perfect location with the shuttle ($5.00 per person per day, running every 20 minutes) to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank  you for your recent stay with us at the Best Western Plus Pavilions.  We are please you enjoyed our hotel and location and look forward to seeing you on future trips to the Anaheim area.  Thank you again.

Summary: The service was excellent from the reception. After leaving a backpack in the transfer shuttle there was a lot of effort put in a fast retrieval, which was a huge relief and appreciated. The distance to Disney world is easy to walk in a few minutes. In addition, this hotel gives an option to get a few FREE breakfast things in the lobby like; an apple, small yoghurt, a muffin, muesli bar, a juice and coffee. The pool ain't big but with high 90's really nice.
Manager Response: Thank  you for your recent stay with us at the Best Western Plus Pavilions.  We are please you enjoyed our hotel and complimentary snacks and look forward to seeing you on future trips to the Anaheim area.  Thank you again.

Summary: Loads of parking, clean room, comfortable bed, a little window in the bathroom for your ventilation needs, a good shower, and an excellent AC unit. Right next to Disneyland Drive! Lightning fast check-in and check-out - extremely nice people working in the lobby!
Manager Response: Thank  you for your recent stay with us at the Best Western Plus Pavilions.  We are please you enjoyed our hotel and location and look forward to seeing you on future trips to the Anaheim area.  Thank you again.

Summary: I stay here every time I come to Anaheim either for business or pleasure to go to Disney.  Easy walk to Downtown Disney and the Disney Parks.  They have remodeled the pool area.  It is better than any pool area at any hotel I have stayed at.  2 full size pools and 2 hot tubs plus a nice restroom area and changing rooms.  The rooms are good.  The breakfast is good too.  Nice staff.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review however I believe by your description you more then likely stayed at the Best Western Plus Stovall's Inn and not the Pavilions.

Summary: The air conditioner was just a few decibels louder than a jet engine. We paid in cash, but could not receive a cash refund when we wanted to cancel the last night of our reservation. The options for breakfast were extremely limited. I became quite ill after swimming in the pool.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay with us at the Best Western Plus Pavilions.  I apologize we did not exceed your expectations. If you would like to discuss your stay further please contact us directly at 714-776-0140.  Thank you again.

Summary: My daughter and I usually stay across the street from the Disneyland main gate. This was a last minute trip and Pavillions was the only place available. What a pleasant surprise. Very friendly and helpful staff. We were able to buy to park hoppers at a discount. The room was clean and comfortable. Wifi worked well. The grab and go breakfast snacks were nothing special. The walk to the parks was doable. We cut through the cast member parking lot across the street to Disneyland Hotel and onward to Downtown Disney. Sometimes we used the Monorail. It cut out a lot of the walk.  The only downside for me is no in room safe.  In the future I will still try to stay on Harbor Blvd. but wouldn't hesitate to stay here if that didn't work out.
Manager Response: Thank  you for your recent stay with us at the Best Western Plus Pavilions.  We are please you enjoyed our hotel and staff and look forward to seeing you on future trips to the Anaheim area.  Thank you again.

Summary: Took a trip to Disneyland with my wife and our daughters, ages 7 and 17. 12 years ago we took our older two girls and stayed at the same hotel, not sure if it was a Best Western Plus at the time. I'll tell you, I won't stay anywhere else! The king suite that we got was huge, it had a connecting room with 3 double beds and two seperate bathrooms, one in each room. I couldn't believe the quality for the price. We were a short walk from the park and there was a 24-hour Dennys in the parking lot. The best part is the pool! Open til 11 and it has a wonderful whirpool too! Outdoor shower and two private changing rooms/bathrooms. I am so happy with the stay that we are planning to come back real soon. You'd be foolish to not stay at a Best Western Plus, and the Best Western Plus
Manager Response: Thank  you for your recent stay with us at the Best Western Plus Pavilions.  We are please you enjoyed our hotel and Family Suite and look forward to seeing you on future trips to the Anaheim area.  Thank you again.

Summary Heading: Nice room and location but beware of extra charges
Summary: We recently stayed July 20-24.   The location was great with a short walk to Disneyland. The only problem I had was that I was overcharged.  The front desk explained that I was  charged extra for using the breakfast vouchers at Dennys.   According to my confirmation and when I was handed the vouchers no one said anything about being charged for using  them.  I spoke with both the manager and the corporate office and both are saying it was legitimate charges.  As you can clearly see on my conformation, it states includes breakfast for two adults.   Please beware of this when you stay at the property.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay with us at the Best Western Plus Pavilions.  As per our conversation the misunderstanding was corrected and you were issued a credit.  If you should have any further questions please contact us directly.  Thank you again.

Summary: Myself, my sister and my 8 year old son stayed here from June 25th to July 6th in room 102. I have nothing but praise for the awesome customer service by management and reception staff who helped us alot with booking theme park tickets, organising tour buses and taxis. Our room was a good size and was clean and the beds were so comfy especially after those long days at Disneyland. The housekeepers and groundstaff did a fantastic job keeping the rooms and hotel grounds clean. The only problem we had during our stay was that one morning we woke to find our bath full of nasty brown stinky water due to a guest in nearby room flushing a towel down the toilet. So we were offered another room but as the problem was fixable we stayed in our room and the plumbing problem was fixed by th
Manager Response: Thank  you for your recent stay with us at the Best Western Plus Pavilions.  We are please you enjoyed our hotel and staff and look forward to seeing you on future trips to the Anaheim area.  Thank you again.

Summary: We stayed here in July 2015. Needed a room that would sleep 2 adults and 4 teens. This room was most likely 2 rooms opened up to make the one large room. There is a nice partition separating one side with a king bed from the other side with 3 double beds. Each side has it's own bathroom and sink area and television. There was a fridge and microwave. It's not new or fancy but it was clean and comfortable. We got shuttle passes to go to Disney and the teens could walk to the convention center. The pizza/ italian restaurant next door is very good. We will rent this room again if in the area.
Manager Response: Thank  you for your recent stay with us at the Best Western Plus Pavilions.  We are please you enjoyed our hotel and Family Suite and look forward to seeing you on future trips to the Anaheim area.  Thank you again.

Summary: Nice clean hotel, easy 15 minute walk to Disneyland parks. Disappointed with the breakfast that was included with our stay, it was called "Grab and Go" breakfast which consisted of choc. chip granola bars, yogurt cups, muffins, apples and bananas. Satisfied with the hotel room.
Manager Response: Thank  you for your recent stay with us at the Best Western Plus Pavilions.  We are please you enjoyed our hotel and location and look forward to seeing you on future trips to the Anaheim area.  Thank you again.

Summary: This is a great place to stay when in Disneyland.  Our room was small, but clean and comfortable.  They don't offer breakfast, but the snacks are perfect for on the go.  They also have free parking which is almost unheard of in the area.  You can take the ART to the park, but we chose to cross the street, go across the Disney parking lot and into Downtown Disney.  Then we took the monorail into the park.  This was an easy walk and cost nothing!   The front desk employees were great.  Very attentive and kind.  We will likely return.
Manager Response: Thank  you for your recent stay with us at the Best Western Plus Pavilions.  We are please you enjoyed our hotel and free parking and look forward to seeing you on future trips to the Anaheim area.  Thank you again.

Summary Heading: Best Western Pavilions directly across street from Disneyland
Summary: Room was clean, WIFI had connection issues, TV had problems but were fixed immediately. Best part is that hotel is located directly across the street from Disneyland and right next to a Dennys. This greatly streamlined our visit to Disneyland. However, because of its location, it was packed with families of small children who made a lot of noise hitting walls, jumping on beds, yelling and slamming doors. Couldn't really use their pool either due to same small children. Overall though, decent price and fairly good experience.
Manager Response: Thank  you for your recent stay with us at the Best Western Plus Pavilions.  We are please you enjoyed our hotel and location and look forward to seeing you on future trips to the Anaheim area.  Thank you again.

Summary: Got a dual queen room to watch the 4th of July fireworks show.  Room was spacious, clean and the beds were comfortable.  Location was the best and there was lots of available of parking.  The walk to Downtown Disney was about 10-15 minutes.  Would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay with us at the Best Western Plus Pavilions.  We are thrilled you enjoyed your stay with us and found our hotel and location helpful during your most recent visit to Anaheim.  We look forward to seeing you on future trips to the Anaheim area.  Thank you again.

Summary: I understand energy conservation but when you arrive to your room expect a sauna. They don't run the AC until you turn it on. Not a welcoming feeling.   We saw two cockroaches at the pool. One I stepped on and the other fell onto my wife's back which gave her quite the shock. The next day we saw the Orkin truck so not sure if some made their way into the suites. We understand these bugs are common in warmer climates but this is the first run in we have had with them. At least none were in our room.   ART bus was convenient and we were its first stop which was nice.  One day out ART bus broke down at Disney but a replacement one was there right away.   For the "breakfast" they offer the room price should be cheaper. Other hotels offer full breakfasts for not much more. There is a
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay with us at the Best Western Plus Pavilions.  I am sorry to here we did not exceed your expectations during your stay and if you would like to discuss any issues you might have had please contact us directly.  Once again I do apologize for not meeting and or exceeding your expectations.

Summary Heading: Best Western - Anaheim - A great place to stay
Summary: Family suite was huge and more than enough room for 6 adults and 2 toddlers. Room was very clean. Very close to Disneyland. You walk across the parking lot to the Paradise Pier hotel. Very Economical price compared to hotels at Disney.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay with us at the Best Western Plus Pavilions.  I am glad you enjoyed your stay and our Family Suite.  Our suite is definitely large enough for families and we are thrilled it worked out for you and your family.  Thank you again for your stay and we hope to see you again on future trips to the Anaheim area.

Summary Heading: Very clean and convenient to Disney
Summary: Room was very clean, bathroom was almost spotless, beds so-so (but I can't sleep good unless I'm in my own bed), quiet in the morning, wireless free but very poor connection. Surrounded by restaurants and shopping if you need things for your trip. Lodging rates are decent compared to others around this area but here parking is FREE. Anaheim Resort Transit runs a bus to Disneyland every 20 minutes and picks up right in front of this hotel. Front Desk staff was super helpful and friendly. I usually will stay at Best Western Plus because rooms have a coffee pot, microwave, refrigerator and they usually serve a hot breakfast. This one does not serve food however Denny's is next door and there are a few other places directly east and west on the same block.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay with us at the Best Western Plus Pavilions.  We are thrilled to hear you enjoyed your stay and the cleanliness of the rooms.  Our Housekeeping staff takes great pride in their work and I will be sure to pass on your comments.  Thank you again and we hope to see you on future trips to the Anaheim area.

Summary: We stay here or the anaheim plus best western every time we come to Disneyland.  Walking distance to the park, lots of close by conveniences.  Love this place and love disneyland am here at least 4 times a year
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your most recent stay with us at the Best Western Plus Pavilions and thank you for always thinking of us when you travel to Anaheim.  We are pleased you enjoyed your stay and looking forward to seeing you soon.

Summary: It was a basic hotel room but newly decorated and extremely comfortable beds. Full breakfast was not provided but the "grab-and-go" items could stave off hunger until later. Bus stop near hotel entrance was convenient for transportation, as it is about a mile walk to the amusement parks. Be aware that you can hear the Disneyland fireworks at this location. (You can also see the higher ones, if you have the right room.)
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay with us at the Best Western Plus Pavilions.  We are pleased to hear you enjoyed your room and the beds during your stay with us.  We hope to see you on future trips to the Anaheim area.  Thank you again.

Summary: I had room 219. Beds were very uncomfortable, shower had temperature problems, the room looked like something from a motel 6, had a cheap wall air conditioner, this room was definitely not worth the price I paid for it. No breakfast bar.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay with us at the Best Western Plus Pavilions.  I am sorry to hear we did not exceed your expectations during your stay.  If you would like to discuss your concerns further please contact us directly.  Thank you again.

Summary Heading: Memorable stay At Best Western Plus Pavilions
Summary: We enjoyed our stay at this suite.  Adults were able to chat while the children went to sleep.  Dennys was next door.  More restaurants were within walking distance.  It is about 15-20 mins walking distance to Disneyland (with kids).  Shuttles to Disneyland available.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay with us at the Best Western Plus Pavilions.  We are thrilled to hear you enjoyed your stay and the Family Suite.  We hope to see you on future trips to the Anaheim area.  Thank you again.

Summary: Stayed here for a whole 4 nights and loved every bit of it... Even though breakfast is a grab n go kind of breakfast, it was great especially if your going to Disneyland! The front desk clerks were so kind and VERY helpful!! The rooms are very clean and just everything you need to have a perfect stay! I will return soon!
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay with us at the Best Western Plus Pavilions.  We are pleased you enjoyed your stay and look forward to seeing you on future trips to the Anaheim area.  Thank you again for your stay and review.

Summary: Close to disneyland. No issue with parking. Across the street from Denny's for late night meal. Room is clean, nice and affordable price. The area is safe but a bit ghetto when it gets later. "Smokers" around at night. All in all, nice place for a good, affordable price
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent visit to Anaheim and the Best Western Plus Pavilions.  We are pleased you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you on future trips to the Anaheim area.  Thank  you again.

Summary: This hotel was the perfect location for us.  We were directly across from Disneyland and could either walk or take the bus which had a stop directly in front of the hotel.  The room was large and roomy with a refrigerator and microwave.  We used the hot tub several nights and could see the fireworks.  We also had easy access to the Interstate to sight see in Los Angeles and Santa Monica.  I would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent visit with us at the Best Western Plus Pavilions.  We are pleased to hear you enjoyed our location and the amenities at the hotel.  We hope to see you on future trips to the Anaheim area.  Thank you again for your stay and review.

Summary Heading: GREAT HOTEL for the RIGHT PRICE!
Summary: This hotel was cute, updated, with comfy beds and free wifi!  They offered free breakfast and you can walk to Disneyland and many restaurants.  The pool was great and it was quiet at night.  Coffee/tea in your room and mini fridge and microwave too. It was CLEAN, CLEAN, CLEAN!!!!!!!! The location is ideal.  Staff was helpful and had a smile on their face!  We will stay here whenever we come back to ANAHEIM!
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent visit to Anaheim and the Best Western Plus Pavilions.  Our staff takes great pride in the cleanliness of the hotel and I am glad you enjoyed our property.  We look forward to seeing you on future trips to the Anaheim area.  Thank you again for your stay and review.

Summary Heading: Great hotel stay with a good price.
Summary: This hotel offered a great price being located close to Disneyland.  The service was great and the rooms were excellent and very comfortable.  There is a restaurant on site and the service there is good. There is a bit of walking involved to get to the Disneyland main gate, but a very reasonable walk to Downtown Disney. I would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent visit to Anaheim and the Best Western Plus Pavilions.  We are pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay and look forward to seeing you on future trips to the Anaheim area.

Summary: This hotel is literally a stones throw from the Happiest Place on Earth.  We walked the half mile from the front gates to the hotel daily.    The rooms were average, but the air conditioner was extremely noisy.  But for the money and the proximity to the theme parks, I will definitely stay there again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent visit to Anaheim and the Best Western Plus Pavilions.  I am happy to hear you found our location helpful to your stay.  I apologize for the AC and wish we would have had the opportunity to correct the problem during your stay.  If you should have any further concerns please contact me directly at 714-776-0140.  Thank you again.

Summary: It was a clean comfortable room, however we were right beside the maids storage room so it was noisy early in the morning which wasn't great. The complementary small breakfast and coffee was great.  The office staff was nice enough but they never smiled or seemed very friendly.  Wasn't as close to Disneyland as I thought so it made for a long walk after a long day in the park. Decent Hotel but nothing special about it.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent visit to Anaheim and the Best Western Plus Pavilions.  I apologize about the noise during your stay and wish we could have been given the opportunity to correct that during your stay.  If you do have any other concerns regarding your stay please contact me directly at 714-776-0140.  Thank you again.

Summary: Close to Disneyland.  Have to walk through the Downtown Disney parking lot but OK. Breakfast is not much other that an apple and a muffin.  We used it as a late morning snack. Nice to have a microwave and refrigerator in the room for late night snacks and as well as making our own breakfast.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay at the Best Western Plus Pavilions.  We are happy to hear you enjoyed the amenities in your room such as the mini fridge and microwave.  We hope to see you on future trips to the Anaheim area.  Thank you again.

Summary Heading: Great Stay at Best Western Plus Pavillion
Summary: The staff offered the best in customer service – friendly, outgoing and, professional.   The rooms were super clean and the beds were extremely comfy. We were there for a Disneyland trip and the hotel’s location is within walking distance.  Everything looked good from the lobby, the rooms, the pool, and the landscaping is all up to date.  It is easy to see that this hotel is very well maintained.  Although they don’t offer a full breakfast, and I was happy with the price that reflects that, they offer a generous snack in the morning, to get us going.   Best Western Plus Pavilion is my new go to place when we make our yearly trip to Disneyland.  I highly recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent visit to Anaheim and the Best Western Plus Pavilions.  We are pleased to hear you found our hotel and location helpful during your stay.  We look forward to seeing you on future trips to Anaheim.  Thank you again for your stay and review.

Summary: Don't come to this hotel and expect any kind of customer services.  There was none received.  The front desk staff was worst than the DMV counter, I would rather stay at a motel to get better service. Location was ok, so was the room.  If you don't care about customer services, then this might be a choice.  I would give it a 2 out of 10.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent visit to the Best Western Plus Pavilions.  I apologize we did not meet your expectations and would love a chance to speak to you directly regarding your concerns.  I will speak to our Front Desk Staff and see where the breakdown occurred.  If you would like to speak further regarding your stay please contact me directly at 714-776-0740.  Thank you

Summary: The beds were clean but the room was small and not comfortable.  The air conditioner was over the bathroom sink counter and was extremely hard to reach ... up very high on the wall.  It blows the air over the top of the ceiling, which gives very little cooling to the room.  The bathroom is very small!!  I wouldn't stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you again for your recent stay.  I apologize we did not meet your expectations and would love an opportunity to correct any concerns you might have on a future visit to the Anaheim area.

Summary: I'm always looking for a good, clean, close hotel to the Disneyland Resort. I'm pleased to say that although it is a good 15/20 minute walk to the front gate of the parks, the area is easy to navigate. I like that you can enter from the west side which gave us the opportunity to go to the Disneyland Hotel to grab some grub or take the monorail in from Downtown Disney.   This is a motel style hotel.
