The rooms are fairly compact and as expected the parking lot was quite full with many families travelling. Due to the motel layout, you do get some noise from the other rooms and the houses behind the building.   Overall, for sleeping and getting access to the parks, I'd recommend this hotel. Do take note that if you want to keep the car in the lot on check-out day, you will pay a fee
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay with us at the Best Western Plus Pavilions.  We are pleased to hear you found our location and hotel enjoyable during your stay.  Please note you are able to keep your car parked at our location until 3pm on the departure date at no charge.  We never charge for parking at our location.  Thank you again for your stay and review.

Summary Heading: Good price walking distance to Disney Resort/Downtown
Summary: The lobby is currently undergoing renovations.  Breakfast is a brown bag, not full breakfast.    Hotel charges an additional $10 "hotel fee," over what you'll see online when booking but  Best Western Plus Stovall's Inn  just down block charges a parking fee of same amount.   Ask for a room in the back and on an upper level unless stairs are a concern.  Those on ground floor have noise of those entering vehicles that are parked right next to building as common with motels.  When walking to Disneyland, know that the shortest way is to walk north on Disneyland Drive and then cut through the Disney's Grand Californian Hotel to Downtown Disney.  It is an easy walk to Disney from Pavilions.  There is an entrance/exit to/from California Adventure through  Disney's Grand Californian
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay with us at the Best Western Plus Pavilions.  We are pleased you enjoyed our location.  We do charge a $5 per night resort fee for being in the Disneyland Resort district and goes to the city of Anaheim and we do offer free parking at our location.  Once again I'd like to thank you for your visit and review.  We hope to see you on future trips to the Anaheim area.

Summary: excelent hotel.  very good room, excelent bathroom.  there is no breakfast available.  tickets available.  frontdesk very welcome.  walking distance to disneyland.  safe neighborghood during the day and night.  very close to restaurants. certanly i will came back.
Manager Response: Thank you again for your recent stay with us at the Best Western Plus Pavilions.  We do offer Grab and Go snacks in the morning which are complimentary and there is breakfast for a fee available next to us at Denny's.  We hope to see you again on future trips to the Anaheim area.  Thank you again for your recent stay and review.

Summary Heading: Very Clean, Walking Distance to Disneyland, ART stops near lobby!
Summary: We stayed here for 7 nights in April, we drove down from Canada and the hotel was easy to get to and there was great parking! The staff were very friendly! The rooms were updated and clean. We stayed in room 130 which was on the lower level in the back, probably the farthest from the front of the hotel. It was nice and quiet. We caught the ART right outside the lobby at the bus stop which was awesome! We also chose to walk to Downtown Disney and the front main gates a couple days. The walk was not too far. We traveled with 4 kids under 7 and they even handled the walk okay. We never got a chance to use the pool but did use the laundry facilities one evening which was nice, just wished it was open longer than 9am-9pm. Most days we stayed at the park longer than that. Minor detail
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay with us at the Best Western Plus Pavilions.  I am pleased to hear you found our location and hotel helpful during your stay.  We look forward to seeing you again on future trips to the  Anaheim area.  Thank you again for your stay and review.

Summary: We stayed here for 8 nights in April. We loved our stay! Beds were very comfy. Staff are so friendly and informative, there is a bus literary at the front entrance as well. It is located at the top end of the other resorts so it is much quieter position and away from all the hussle and bussle of downtown (of course this is personal choice) The only issue we found was we were not informed that there were building works being done at the time of our stay and would have been nice to have a better breakfast offered but no big deal as we just went with what was on offer.  Love this place and would highly recommend it to anyone :-)
Manager Response: Thank you for your stay with us in April at the Best Western Plus Pavilions.  We are pleased you enjoyed our hotel and location and we look forward to seeing you again on future trips to the Anaheim area.  Thank you again.

Summary: my husband and i stayed here for 4 nights in April 2015, good size room clean, tidy, staff were helpful, close to the adventure parks and downtown Disney. next to a convenience store and pizza restaurant, plus a Deneys restaurant right out front. value for money we both thought it was pretty good.
Manager Response: Thank you for your stay with us at the Best Western Plus Pavilions in April of this year.  I am pleased to here you found our location and hotel helpful during your stay and we look forward to seeing you again on future trips to the Anaheim area.

Summary: We stayed at Best Western Plus Pavilions for one night because I couldn't justify staying at Disneyland Hotel an extra night and not using going to one of the Parks.  The price for a two-room suite was under $180 and after seeing that the hotel was advertised as having a Continental Breakfast, I booked the hotel.  The staff was friendly and helpful and we received 4 coupons for free kids meals at the Denny's right next door.  It's about a 10 minute walk to Disneyland, but with our luggage and all  we took a $10 cab ride to the Disneyland Hotel for the rest of our stay in Anaheim which the morning desk staff graciously arranged for us.  My only complaint is that I expected a bit more from what was advertised as the Continental Breakfast; it's really more like "breakfast
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay with us at the Best Western Plus Pavilions.  I apologize for any confusion on the breakfast.  We do not offer a full continental breakfast and our site list it as "Grab and Go snacks"  which are complimentary and there is breakfast available for a fee next door at Denny's.  I do apologize for not meeting your expectations in the area.  Once again I would like to thank you for your recent visit.

Summary Heading: Great place for a great value
Summary: Out of all the hotels near Disneyland. This has to be one of the best options for both price, confort and convenience. Located at the southwest corner across from California Adventure, it's only a 15 minute walk to the park through Downtown Disney. The hotel is not located near the freeways and the pool/hot tub area(really nice) is both quiet and away from the road.  The room was very nice and comfortable with many tv channel options for relaxing in the room. I paid $89 a night for Sun-Wed which was a much better price than most of the hotels near Disneyland. I felt like I totally got my money's worth.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay with us at the Best Western Plus Pavilions.  We are pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay with us and found the location and property helpful during your stay.  We look forward to seeing you again on future trips to the Anaheim area.  Thank you again.

Summary: This hotel is conveniently located near Downtown Disney and the Anaheim Convention Center.  Both locations are within a 10 minute walk.  Hotel is simple and clean, and has a reasonably sized pool.  There are also restaurants located nearby.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay with us in April.  We are pleased to hear you enjoyed our location and the hotel during your visit.  We look forward to seeing you on future trips to the Anaheim area.

Summary Heading: Good Clean Hotel close to Disneyland
Summary: Clean hotel and nice staff. I stay at many  Best Westerns and this breakfast is really bad..But the hotel is fine. Walking distance to Disneyland and free parking, which is a plus. I might stay again but I will look around at other hoteles too.
Manager Response: Thank you for your stay with us in April.  I am please you enjoyed the hotel and our staff.  Our location offers the Grab and Go Snacks in the morning and breakfast is available for a fee next door at Denny's.  I apologize if we did not meet your expectations in regards to breakfast.   Thank you again for your stay and we hope to see you again on future trips to the Anaheim area.

Summary Heading: Average.  Served it's purpose for Disneyland trip.
Summary: For the price, this hotel was decent.  It was my first stay because my first choice was sold out due to the Star Wars Convention.  The room was clean and stocked with the appropriate amenities.  The building is a bit old so the room was a bit on the musty side but also could be because of the air conditioner.  The pool area was small but adequate.  The kids enjoyed it very much.  The front desk staff were always friendly and knowledgeable.  We appreciated the option to use the ART shuttle.  However, the walk to the park wasn't unmanageable.  The breakfast options were small due to the construction so we opted to go elsewhere but it looked appetizing "to go".  We had a 4am shuttle back to the airport and noticed homeless people and MANY grocery bags piled all over the benches
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay with us in April.  I will look into your issues regarding the hotel and the local bus stop.  I apologize if we did not exceed your exceptions.

Summary: The issues that I have with this hotel is that it doesn't meet my expectations of a Best Western Plus hotel.  I am very familiar with the brand and this should be just a normal Best Western hotel.    The bed was hard and I could feel the springs.  In the 4 nights I stayed I never slept though the night because the bed was so uncomfortable.  They have also followed the trend of small square pillows which means if you move around in your sleep your hear is either going to be way jammed up or your head will fall in between the pillows.  It just doesn't make for a good nights sleep.    Beyond that the room smelled musty like it might have had water damage at some point.  They had painted the grout in the bathroom and the paint was peeling off in the shower.    The grab and go
Manager Response: Thank you for your stay in April.  I apologize for not meeting your expectations and I will speak to my staff regarding additional training to ensure these issues do not happen again.  Thank you for bring this to my attention and I hope you will consider staying with us again.

Summary: Good location. We could walk to DisneyLand and the convention center. Great parking, friendly staff. Pool was much larger and better location than some of the others we could see from the street, which is important to me!
Manager Response: Thank you for your stay with us in April.  We are pleased you found our location and pool enjoyable during your stay.  We look forward to seeing you on future trips to the Anaheim area.  Thank you again.

Summary: I booked 4 rooms for my girl scout trip.  The reservation process was very smooth.  They even allowed me to book and pre pay for two rooms that I knew would be occupied sooner than my own arrival.  Check out process was easy.  If I had a recommendation, I would suggest leaving instructions of how to use the TV.  We didn't figure it out until we left.  Overall, great experience and we would use them again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay with us at the Best Western Plus Pavilions.  We are please your group enjoyed the stay at our hotel.  We love The Girl Scouts.  We hope you will think of us on future trips to the Anaheim area.  Thank you again.

Summary Heading: Very clean, good location and affordable
Summary: This place has everything you need, and it is clean and affordable.  Good location, so not too noisy like other places on the Disney strip.  I would recommend this place to pretty much everyone.  Good luck.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay with us at the Best Western Plus Pavilions.  We take great pride in the cleanliness of our rooms and property and we are pleased you enjoyed your stay.  We look forward to seeing you on future trips to the Anaheim area, thank you again.

Summary: Stayed 4 nights with young children to visit DL and go to the beach.  Very pleased with our entire stay.  Rooms were spacious, clean and comfortable.  Rooms were always cleaned early and we appreciated this as a couple times we came back during the afternoon for a rest.  Roughly a 20 minute walk to the front gates of DL.  Free parking a major plus.  Several hotels just a few doors down were charging over $20/day.  Grab and go breakfast was handy and consisted of apple juice, coffee, muffins, yogurt, apples, and granola bars.  Pool was nice too after a hot day of walking around the park.    Shout out to the evening staff too....one night I was doing laundry past closing hours for the laundry room and the gentleman (didn't get his name) kept it open an hour past so I could finish
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay with us at the Best Western Plus Pavilions.  I will pass on your compliments to the night staff.  I am happy to hear the upgrades to the Lobby area did not impact your stay with us and we look forward to seeing you on future trips to the Anaheim area.  Thank you again.

Summary: Pros. Stayed here for WonderCon.  We arrived early in the morning way before check in and in costume. They didn't bat at en eye at our costumes and were very pleasant and friendly. They let us park way early before check in and park late after check out.  (As long as they didn't need the parking spot for checked in people.) Which is very reasonable. Unlike the other hotels I called up which said we would have to pay for parking, and then pay extra to park early or late.   The room was super clean. No loose hairs, well scrubbed all around the toilet,  no stains on the carpet or furniture, and not a crease or wrinkle to be found in the bed spreads.  As a bonus, the mattress was even and didn't feel like  thousand other people slept there and the mattress molded around them.  While
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay with us at the Best Western Plus Pavilions.  We are thrilled to hear you found our location and hotel helpful to your stay here in Anaheim.  Our Housekeeping staff takes great pride in the rooms and the over property.  We look forward to seeing you on future trips to the Anaheim area.  Thank you again.

Summary Heading: Great hotel close to Disney land
Summary: This hotel was great to stay at, comfy beds and friendly staff. The hotel was having some renovations being done on their reception but it didn't effect out stay. Also nice pool and free breakfast snacks ( yogurt, apples, muesli bars and muffins). Only a 15 minute walk to Disney land or you can catch a bus for $5. Would highly recommend :)
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay with us at the Best Western Plus Pavilions.  We are pleased you found our location and Grab and Go Breakfast Snacks helpful during your stay.  We look forward to seeing you on future trips to the Anaheim area.

Summary: I have stayed here many times! The room was clean, the staff was wonderful, and it was close to the parks! My friend and I were able to walk to and from the parks easily! We also felt safe while there it was our first trip just us two and it was nice to feel secure and to know our luggage was safe while we were at the parks all day.
Manager Response: Thank  you for always thinking of us on your Anaheim getaways.  We love our return guest.  Thank you for your most recent stay and we look forward to seeing you on your next adventure to Anaheim.

Summary Heading: Close and comfortable for a Disneyland trip!
Summary: This hotel is quite comfortable, and a good value. Coming from the east coast it was surprising to be so close to the parks. There is a shuttle (ART) that has a stop directly in front of the hotel and takes you straight to the parks for $5/day. Right now the office was being renovated so the breakfast offerings were not what we expected, but still good. Also very nice that the pool is open until pretty late in case you feel like a dip after your day! But if you want to use the mini refrigerator, make sure it´s turned on! We stashed some things there as soon as we got in, and then went straight to the park - needless to say they were warm when we got back. Oops!
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay with us at the Best Western Plus Pavilions.  We are happy our location and pools were helpful to you during your stay and I am sorry to hear about the items in the fridge.  We hope to see you again on future trips to the Anaheim area.  Thank you again.

Summary: Good value for what you get. The bathroom was small. Good location for Disneyland resort. We did not use the pool, but other guests we spoke with said is was in good condition and clean. Overall, very satisfied.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay with us at the Best Western Plus Pavilions.  Next time you visit you will have to visit our pool, we do get quite a few compliments on it.  Thank you again and we look forward to seeing  you on future trips to Anaheim.

Summary: I have stayed at this hotel 5 times while going to Disneyland and participating in the RunDisney events.  I am never disappointed in the room or service.  The staff has always been helpful and courteous and the rooms clean.  It is so convenient to Disneyland and all of the fun of the area.
Manager Response: Thank you for your most recent stay with at the Best Western Plus Pavilions.  We are so happy to hear you enjoy our Hotel and we look forward to seeing you on future trips to the Anaheim area.

Summary: We stayed at the Best Western Pavilions for 3 nights. It was great because it was walking distance to the park, Denny's was next door and the property was very quit for a weekend. Service was great and so was the beds.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your recent stay with us at the Best Western Plus Pavilions.  We are pleased you found our location and staff helpful during your stay.  We look forward to seeing you on future trips to Disneyland and the Anaheim area.

Summary: This was a good place to stay for our Disney trip! The staff was super friendly, the rooms were very clean and there is a convenience store right Nextdoor to buy wine, beer, water and snacks! The walk is a little further than the hotels on the Harbor Blvd but it's a nice, quiet walk up Disneyland Blvd through the resort area and downtown Disney! The only downside was that the pillows are flat and they wouldn't give us more.  Also use Uber for you travel to and from airport. It was only $20! Vs a $50 cab!
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your recent stay with us at the Best Western Plus Pavilions.  We are pleased you found our location helpful to your stay and we look forward to seeing you on future trips to the Anaheim area.

Summary Heading: Great Hotel Comfortable and Clean Rooms
Summary: Everything was great except I was disappointed with the breakfast which was a couple of muffins and some granola bars. I could not get to them because there was a family with a stroller and the place was not big enough to get by them. Other than that the place was perfect.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay with us at the Best Western Plus Pavilions.  I am sorry to hear you were unable to enjoy our Grab and Go Breakfast snack.   I hope on future trips to Anaheim you will still think of staying here and giving us another opportunity.  Thank you again for recent visit.

Summary: Made a last minute decision to surprise our grand kids in Disneyland so we had no hotel reservations. Couldn't get the hotel the kids were at so chose this nearby location. Glad we did. Close proximity to Disney, clean, and friendly staff. Stayed a second night. Would have been nice for a bigger breakfast as we became accustomed to with most Best Western hotels. Called it a grab and go instead. I would stay there again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay with us at the Best Western Plus Pavilions.  What a great surprise in meeting up with your family for a Disneyland "get away".  We are happy to hear you found our location helpful and our rooms clean.  We look forward to seeing you on future trips to the Anaheim area.  Thank you again.

Summary: We usually stay at Best Westerns, and this one is very disappointing, it was loud and dirty, and the breakfast was "snacks" not a breakfast, we went to the Denny's in the parking lot.  We paid more for this hotel and any other hotel we stayed at.  Very disappointed!
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay with us at the Best Western Plus Pavilions.  I apologize you were not happy with your stay.  I would love to speak to you more about your stay and get more details from you.  Our Housekeeping staff takes great pride in our rooms and property and I am surprised to hear there was an issue on cleanliness.  Our property does not offer a complimentary hot breakfast at this time and that is why we only list the Grab and Go Breakfast Snack on our site.  If I can assist you with any other questions or concerns regarding your stay please contact the hotel directly at 714-776-0140.

Summary: Clean, comfortable and walking distance to Disneyland Park.  Less expensive than comparative hotels. The beds are super comfortable.  Only a slight issue getting boarding pass on lobby computer but used Best Western Stovalls facility and got it.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay with us at the Best Western Plus Pavilions.  We are glad you found the hotel's location helpful during your visit along with the cleanliness and comfort of the rooms.  Being a short walk to both Parks our location is great for people visiting Disneyland.  We hope to see you on future trips to the Anaheim area.  Thank you again.

Summary Heading: Budget hotel with a great location.
Summary: Well located with a 15 minute walk to main gates. You can see California Adventure from the hotel. Rooms were a bit dated but clean. Nice bed with bar fridge, microwave and coffee machine. Grab and go breakfast was good for those on the go. Right next door is a Denny's and on the other side a convenience store with liquor sales. Staff was friendly and a computer with printer available for boarding passes. Nice pool with Jacuzzi. Good value especially if you plan on spending most of your time at Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay with us at the Best Western Plus Pavilions.  We are glad you found value in our hotel and found the location helpful to your stay.  We hope to see you on future trips to the Anaheim/Disneyland area.  Thank you again

Summary: Valentines day weekend was awesome, my wife and I had a great time staying at Best Western Plus 1176, not only the price was great but the location, the service and the rooms and property was specious and clean. Entry to Disneyland was never this is easy it was like walking to your own house. NO REALLY IT IS THAT EASY ! Cut the waiting and check in time to the park by 75% and I have been going to Disneyland for the last 30yrs. Thanks Again!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your recent stay with us at the Best Western Plus Pavilions and your glowing review.  We are pleased you had a great Valentine's Day Weekend getaway.  We look forward to seeing you on future trips to the Anaheim area.

Summary: The staff was exceptional!  The rooms are clean, and comfortable.  The location was great for a walk to Disneyland.  The pool was clean and quiet.  We were very happy here for the value.  We would highly recommend this location.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay with us at the Best Western Plus Pavilions.  We are thrilled to hear you found our location and hotel helpful during your stay and we look forward to seeing you on future trips to the Anaheim area.

Summary Heading: A good, clean, practical hotel - and pleasant stay
Summary: The room and hotel grounds are clean and organized.  They have a swimming pool and jacuzzi.  The hotel was built during the era when most hotels around Disneyland were constructed, but it is well-maintained.  Rooms don't front right up against Katella (the main access road) - you get less traffic noise in your room versus some other hotels in the area.  It was a pleasant stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay with us at the Best Western Plus Pavilions.  At the Pavilions we take great pride in our hotel and grounds.  We are happy to hear you found them pleasing and clean.  We look forward to seeing you on your next trip to the Anaheim area.

Summary Heading: Great location, easy access to Disneyland
Summary: Let's just start off by saying that this hotel is you avg Best Western. However, it has everything that one could ever ask for. Minutes to the parks. Sure there are hotels that are closer. But for the value, this nothing beats this hotel. You can easily walk over to Downtown Disney. Not to mention, there's free wifi and more importantly there's free parking. The rooms are clean and the staff is friendly. I would highly recommend this Best Western!
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay with us at the Best Western Plus Pavilions.  We are happy you found  our free parking and wifi helpful along with our staff.  We hope to see you on future trips to the Anaheim area.  Thank you again.

Summary: 1. The beds were too firm, as were the pillows  2. The people above us were tromping around, like a herd of elephants until well after 12:30. We reported the problem after 11:00 pm, but Nothing Was done....  They began again before 7:00 am.  3.  The remote for the AC/Heater didn't work  4.  The valve for the shower leaked to the faucet  5. The breakfast was a joke... no eggs: Apples, Small CHEAP GMO granola bars, & packaged muffins  6. The room was small and there was only 1 luggage rack & shampoo for one of two women  7.  There was no room for the luggage rack at the foot of the bed   When I attempted to report the problem to Naylley @ check-out, her snotty tone of voice immediately let me know that she didn't care, nor did she want to hear about the problems.  Not only was her
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Love this place, stayed many times!
Summary: This is my go-to hotel in Anaheim, staying there maybe 5-6 times so far. The front desk is always MORE than helpful and friendly. The location is perfect- short walk to the Anaheim Convention center and close walk to Disney. Tons of great Mexican food all around. The pool and hot tub areas are nice and well kept- as are all of the grounds- always clean, always well taken of.  Def recommend this place if Anaheim is on your radar.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay with us at the Best Western Plus Pavilions.  We are happy you found our location and hotel staff helpful.  We look forward to seeing you again on your next trip back to the Anaheim area.  Thank you again for always letting us be your home away from home when in Orange County.

Summary: We couldn’t have been more pleased with the hotel accommodations, the cleanliness of the whole hotel grounds, and especially the rooms, how comfortable they were.  The room had everything we needed.  It perfect spot for us, Denny's was just across the front lobby parking lot. Being across from Disneylad, saw the fireworks almost every evening.  The staff and hotel manager, Lara  were so helpful and sweet.  We even bought Knott's Berry Farm tickets and they helped us get them very easy.  We will be back for sure  next time coming to So Cal !!!!!!
Manager Response: Thank  you for your recent stay with us and your glowing review.  We received your Thank You card as well and your thoughtfulness has not gone unnoticed.  We hope to see you again on future trips back to Orange County and the Anaheim area.

Summary: If you're looking for a clean, no frills, hotel within walking distance to Disneyland, this is an excellent choice.  I've stayed here many times as well as many other hotels around Disneyland and this is the best value for your money in my opinion.  They have an incredibly friendly front desk staff and are always welcoming and cheerful.
Manager Response: Welcome back.  We always welcome and love repeat guest and we thank you for always thinking of us on your trips to the Anaheim area.  Thank you for your most recent stay and we look forward to seeing you on your next trip.

Summary: We mainly picked this hotel due to its location to Disney! Loved how close it was, literally across the parking lot and we were in Downtown Disney! Very clean and whilst no breakfast offered (other than grab and go fruit and coffee) we got kids eat free coupons for Denny's. The pool was great, clean and warmish! Hot tub was hot! Would stay here again! One negative was the ART bus that we paid $30 to use over the 4 nights we were there, to save on a little walking. Only used it twice as it never showed up on time So was quicker to walk!
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay with us at the Best Western Plus Pavilions.  As you stated we are just a short walk to both Disneyland Parks and I apologize for any issues you might have had with the shuttle.  The ART shuttle is operated by the city of Anaheim and I will look into any issues they might have been having over the last week.  If you have any other concerns regarding your stay please contact the hotel directly so we can better assist you.  Thank you again and we hope to see you on future trips to the Anaheim area.

Summary: Friendly staff, additional grab and go breakfast snacks, general cleanliness, and proximity to DL and CA make this hotel a great place to stay.  We have chosen hotels farther away from resort area to save $$$ but this will likely be our new first choice.  Great hotel for runDisney events.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay with us a the Best Western Plus Pavilions during the race.  We look forward to seeing for future races.  Thank you again.

Summary Heading: Had a great stay for our Disney vacay
Summary: We found a good price for this  hotel.  Was a great value.  Would recommend this hotel.  Staff was very helpful and polite. They were wonderful.  We asked to check in early and they accommodated us.  Pool and jacuzzi were fabulous, after long days at the Park.  Towels are provided poolside. Walking distance from Disney land but it is a slightly longish walk (10-15 min). Very doable for fit people and cooperative children.  Walked to and from DL, 3 times and it was fine.  Room looked nice and was clean.  Was quiet overall, with one slightly noisy night.  Ear plugs took care of that.   I found the beds really comfortable and slept well.   Recommend a 2nd floor room.      Lots of dining within a mile.  There is an Italian restaurant in the small mall next door, which was pretty
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us at the Best Western Plus Pavilions.  I am glad you found our location and staff helpful during your stay as well as the coupons for Denny's next door.  We look forward to seeing you on future trips to Anaheim.  Thank you again.

Summary: We came to visit friends in the area.  We love this hotel and the staff here.  We always come back to the hotel when in the area.  Great beds and the internet was good.  There is a nice laundry room and fitness room here.  The kids love the pool and the jacuzzi
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay with us at the Best Western Plus Pavilions.  I am pleased to hear you found the amenities at the hotel useful during your travels.  We look forward to seeing you on future trips to the Anaheim and Disneyland area.  Thank you again.

Summary Heading: Sub Par Quality but great location!
Summary: Beware of the fine print before booking this hotel! The rooms serve a high volume of guests and are not maintained. In our room the cooling system was broken & the WIFI was sub-par too! Their free breakfast is a "grab & go" type serving few choices. The transportation to the resorts is not included...It costs you an extra $5.00/day where the buses run every 20 minutes!
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay with us at the Best Western Plus Pavilions.  I am sorry to hear you were not completely satisfied with your stay.  If you should have any other concerns please contact me directly so I can assist you better.  In regards to our hotel we do offer the Grab and Go Breakfast snack which is noted on our website and the shuttle to Disneyland is operated by the city of Anaheim and is for a fee.  If there is anything I can assist you with further please contact the hotel directly at 714-776-0140.  Thank you again.

Summary: We stayed at the BW Pavilions Plus while visiting Disneyland. Our first impression wasn't great... We tried to check in early and our room wasn't ready (we arrived at 10am and they told us to come back after 3pm) which was not a problem until they refused to keep our luggage for us at the hotel (not to mention the front counter attendant was quite rude and clearly not interested in assisting us). Not wanting to waste half a day that we could spend at Disneyland, we had to leave our luggage in our rental car. Thankfully the car wasn't broken into! This was enough to make us consider switching hotels for the duration of our stay.   Luckily that evening when checking in, we discovered Michael who was unbelievably friendly and helpful. It was only thanks to his help that we decided
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay with us at the Best Western Plus Pavilions.  I apologize for not holding your luggage upon check in and will speak to our morning staff regarding this.  I am happy the night staff made up for the mishap in the morning.  If you should have any further concerns regarding your stay please contact me directly to discuss.  Thank you again for your stay.

Summary: Really close to Disneyland. Great value overall. Couple of minor glitches. Shower temp kept varying from hot to cold without touching shower water faucet controls. Had to call the desk twice to get the exercise room opened on two separate days. Breakfast was a bit skimpy. Would recommend if your room price is around $100.00 before all the taxes.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us at the Best Western Plus Pavilions.  We are happy you found overall value minus the couple glitches and I will look into those.  We hope to see you on future trips back to the Anaheim/Disneyland area.  Thank you again.

Summary Heading: decent budget hotel close by Disneyland and California Adventures
Summary: This is a decent budget hotel that is walkable to Disneyland and CA Adventures (cross the street, through the parking lot, through Downtown Disney)--a pretty easy walk.  Parking and wifi is free (which is nice).  There's a shuttle from the hotel to Disneyland for $5.    Room is decent--beds are slightly lumpy, pillows are extra soft and the blankets are decent (wish the blankets were a little fluffier).  The water pressure in the shower isn't very strong.  Towels are a little scratchy.  The walls are pretty thin--I could hear the next room and the people snoring next door.  There are snacks in the morning that you can take with you while you're out--this is a nice amenity (apples, apple juice boxes, blueberry muffins, granola bars, coffee).
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay with us at the Best Western Plus Pavilions.  I apologize for the noise at night and hope that doesn't stop you from staying with us again.  I am happy you found the Grab and Go Breakfast Snack helpful during your stay and we hope to see you on your next trip back to the Anaheim area.  Thank  you again.

Summary: We stayed here on a family vacation right after Christmas, and were really happy.  The room was clean and quiet. The front desk staff was extremely helpful and friendly.  Just a short inexpensive shuttle ride to Disney, and not a terrible walk if you choose to walk.  I would recommend this motel to anyone who decided to stay off property for a Disney vacation.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay with us at the Best Western Plus Pavilions.  We are thrilled you enjoyed your stay and found our hotel staff friendly and our location helpful.  We look forward to seeing you on future trips to the Anaheim and Disneyland area.  Thank you again.

Summary: hotel in itself was very good to excellent in service, room cleanliness and appearance.  staff was attentive and very helpful and quick on check in and check out.  does give discounts for AAA.  only drawback was the distance and route thru the entire Disneyland parking lot of staff and quests necessary to walk thru before getting to Downtown Disney and then walking its entire length before getting to the main entrances to the park.  quite a distance.  really the last hotel on the end of Katella to stay out and away from the main bunch available.  otherwise, great place, next to a Denny's too.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay with us at the Best Western Plus Pavilions for your "Christmas Getaway".  Our hotel takes great pride in Customer Service and we are pleased we did not disappoint during your stay.  We are a few minutes walk to the park and the city does offer a shuttle for a fee.  We hope you will consider us on future trips to the Anaheim area.  Thank you again and Happy New Year.

Summary: Stayed at this hotel with my family whilst visiting Disneyland.  Was fantastically close, 10 min walk through car park to Disneyland walk of frame.   Denny's restaurant just across from the hotel for quick easy meals.   Room was lovely and big.. Only down fall was that we were given a room right next to the wash room, so was a little humid.   Overall, a good place to stay with family.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay with us at the Best Western Plus Pavilions.  We are happy to hear you found our location helpful and the size of our rooms enjoyable for your stay.  We hope to see you on future trips to the Disneyland and Anaheim area.  Thank you again.

Summary: Thank you Best Western Pavilions for an awesome stay , your rates are extremely reasonable  , your location great , so close to eating  It was such as bonus to have access to the internet to keep in touch with news back home and keep in contact with family and friends
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay with us at the Best Western Plus Pavilions and your wonderful review.  We are thrilled you enjoyed your stay and our location.  We wish you a Happy New Year and look forward to seeing you on future trips to the Anaheim Area.  Thank you again.

Summary: I normally stay on Harbour but because of the decent rates offered at the Best Western, I thought I would try something different.  Found the location to be quiet.  Perfect because I was running the Avengers half marathon and I just had to cross the street, cut through the parking lot and I was at the race.  They had some breakfast offerings and the staff was very friendly.  Room itself was clean.  I would stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you for giving us a shot.  We are thrilled to hear you enjoyed your stay with us at the Best Western Plus Pavilions.  We hope to see you for future Marathons in Anaheim.  Thank you again.

Summary: Basic older motel with updates, big rooms with fridge, microwave, clean, and friendly service. Most importantly, an easy walk to Downtown Disney, Disneyland & California Adventure Park. Unlike some hotels/motels in the area, it is quiet, that is, no freeway noise.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay with us at the Best Western Plus Pavilions.  I am glad to hear you found our location and hotel helpful during your stay.  We hope to see you on your next trip to the Anaheim area.

Summary: We are checking out today, checked in on the 1st. We checked in very late Monday and the Front desk gentleman was really friendly and informative, a welcome sight to the end of a long trip to here. Just as we were arriving and unloading the car, the night security (which was good to see) was just coming on shift and despite his just arriving to work with his personal gear, welcomed us and wanted to assist us with our luggage to the room. The room was extremely clean, and I am a bit of a notorious clean freak with a serious bed bug fear. Serious. So with this phobia, I stripped the sheets off the bed and did a detailed inspection, and relieved to learn that the visual cleanliness was equal to the hidden. Very clean and of course zero evidence of a previous infestation. Everything
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us at the Best Western Plus Pavilions.  We take great pride in the cleanliness of our rooms and hotel grounds.  I am happy to see you enjoyed your room and your stay with us.  I will pass on your comment to our Security team of their helpfulness as well.  Thank you again for your stay and review.  We hope to see you on future trips to the Anaheim area.

Summary: We arrived early on Nov 22 and we were allowed to check in early.  Clerk was very friendly and helpful.  We departed on Nov 28.  Our room was cleaned every day, and it was spotless each day. Fresh linens, toilitries replaced daily. Across street from disney employee parking.  Walked about 10-15 minutes to Disney city which was entrance to Disney land and Calif. Adventure.  Hotel was net to 7-11, and an Italian eatery that was very good.  Parking was free.  Pool and hot spa were cleaned daily and fresh towels daily at pool. I would highly recommend this place.  The only negative was that we were charged a "bed tax" of $14.75 a day for 6 days??? This was probably one way of paying for the free parking.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay with us at the Best Western Plus Pavilions.  I am glad you found our location helpful during your stay and you found your room and the property clean.  The bed tax is a city tax for the city of Anaheim and does not go to the hotel and it is 17%.  Thank you again for your stay and we look forward to seeing you on future trips to the Anaheim area.

Summary: This hotel was very clean. We had a room upstairs and it was very spacious and had a great view of the Disneyland fireworks! Guest laundry had 2 washers & 2 driers (coin operated) inside. The Disneyland shuttle stop was outside the front of the hotel and bus (ART) tickets can be purchased from reception. You can also walk to Disneyland from this hotel. Every morning they had free breakfast snacks (muffins, fruit, yoghurt, muesli bars and fruit juice boxes and coffee). Reception staff were very friendly and helpful. We enjoyed our short stay (3 nights) and would definitely recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us at the Best Western Plus Pavilions.  I am glad you enjoyed your stay with us.  I'm glad you found the Guest Laundry, location and ART bus useful.  We hope to see you on future trips to the Anaheim area.  Thank you again.

Summary: Some of the best nightly rates around the Disneyland Resort. They are on the ART shuttle route, but save your money, the parks are easy walking distance, even after a Run Disney Half Marathon. Close enough to hear the park fireworks, though depending on room location, you might not see them. This hotel has FREE parking unlike most of the others in the area. They also have a free "grab & go" breakfast. It was light, but did the job when opening the parks up. Room was nice. Staff was very friendly, even those who normally don't deal with guests (pool cleaner, grounds keepers, etc). The free wifi was great for easily uploading the days photos to all of our favorite social media outlets. The value on this hotel is amazing. So amazing, that we have already booked our next Disneyland
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay with us at the Best Western Plus Pavilions.  We are thrilled you enjoyed your stay and found our location helpful.  I have also passed on your compliments to the staff that takes care of our grounds.  We look forward to seeing you on future trips to the Anaheim area.

Summary: What I liked best about this hotel was the pleasant surprise of how nice the room was when we entered it.  This hotel is set up like a motel, and the outside doesn't look fancy, but the inside just seemed so new and clean and comfortable.  It was great!! There was lots of space in our room, the vanity was huge,  and it is so close to Disney that we just walked there!  Another drawing point was the hot tub- after we came back from Disneyland, our feet were hurting, and it was amazing to just soak our feet for a bit before bed :-)  The pool area is open pretty late.  If you don't want to stay at Disneyland for the fireworks, but would still like to see them, you can sit on a bench right near the lobby and view them from there too.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay with us at the Best Western Plus Pavilions and for your review.  We are glad to hear you found the hotel and the pool area enjoyable during your stay.  Our rooms are meant to be a home away from home and I hope we made you feel that way.  We look forward to seeing you on future trips to the Anaheim area.  Thank you again.

Summary Heading: Disney close & great pizza next door
Summary: The hotel is nice, comfy beds and a microwave, fridge and coffee maker included.  The location is next to Denny's and also Marri's Pizza (they deliver).  The Disney shuttle picks up right outside the hotel.  Rooms are clean and comfortable.  They also have a pool/spa and daily 'fast' breakfast (i.e. not hot).  Staff are nice as well... Overall a good choice for anyone wanting to save a few bucks on a Disney vacation. Excellent location for the start of any Disney race as well, which is why we chose this location.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay with us at the Best Western Plus Pavilions.  We are happy to hear you found our location and hotel helpful during your stay as well as enjoyed the surrounding restaurants.  We hope to see you on future trips to the Anaheim area and Thank You again.

Summary: I had absolutely no issues with this hotel at all.  Friendly staff. Clean, comfortable room. We had the King Suite with 3 doubles and it was huge. And the value for that huge of a room was fantastic. About 20 minute walk to main gates, or take the ART, which was helpful. Overall, an excellent hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay with us at the Best Western Plus Pavilions.  We are happy to hear you enjoyed our Family Suite and the hotel in general.  We hope to see you on future trips to the Anaheim area.  Thank you again.

Summary: This was a very clean hotel for a great price. It was close to Disneyland with an easy access shuttle. Nice pool, friendly staff, free wifi! Breakfast place close by. We will definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay with us at the Best Western Plus Pavilions.  I am pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay with us.  We hope to see you again on your next trip to the Anaheim area.

Summary: On a recent stay to Disneyland I decided to try a BW again, this place is right on Katella across from the park and they have shuttle stop right in front that runs about every 20-30 to the parks. The front office staff was very cheerful and friendly and we got to check in way before we expected to. (although I know that will depend on the season and availability of rooms) it was a nice added plus. Lots of FREE parking at this location. The room was very clean and comfortable with very good beds and linens and a very clean bathroom that was well stocked. The a/c was great as was the free wifi and big screen TV  If you get really hungry.......not to sorry, there is a Denny's right next door. I'd stay here again anytime I was in the area.
Manager Response: Thank you for your stay with us at the Best Western Plus Pavilions.  We are thrilled to know you found our location, amenities, and hotel enjoyable.  We hope to see you on your next trip to the Anaheim area.  Thank you again.

Summary: I normally stay at the best western down the street but it was all booked up. I figured I would give this one a shot. The rooms are really nice. The two draws back is they charge a resort fee not really sure why and they do not offer a breakfast. Other then that the beds are comfortable and I cannot complain as I was using my rewards points.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay with us at the Best Western Plus Pavilions.  We are happy to hear you found our hotel and beds enjoyable.  Although we do charge an Anaheim Resort Fee we do not charge for parking at our location with several other properties do.  We hope on future trips to Anaheim you will think about staying at our hotel again.  Thank you.

Summary Heading: Great location and value. No frills
Summary: This is a basic, no-frills hotel close to Disneyland. Room was modern and clean. Great value compares to some other hotels nearer to Disney.Free parking and wi-fi. Bear in mind you will need to either walk 10-15 minutes through Disney's parking lot in order to get to Downtown Disney (from which you can take the monorail to Disneyland or walk to the Disney California Adventure); or take the Anaheim Resorts Transport shuttle service, that runs every 20 minuets and takes about 15 minutes to get to the Disneyland resort. The shuttle service is not very reliable and one day we had to wait 40 minutes. In addition, you need to buy tickets to the shuttle at the hotel lobby (tickets are not sold on the bus) and during our stay the hotel "ran out" of child tickets, so we had to buy the
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay with us at the Best Western.  I am glad you enjoyed your stay and I apologize about the mishap with the ART Shuttle service.  We look forward to seeing you on future trips to the Anaheim area.  Thank you again.

Summary Heading: Great location for disney or business
Summary: If you are going to either Disneyland or coming for business this hotel is situated in an excellent way. Just a 15 min. walk from Disneyland and a 10 min. walk from the Anaheim convention center, thou it is a bit pricey but it is to be expected in an area like this.   The rooms are very good and clean and check-in is very fast. Being a European i just don't like the fact that this hotel (like many other in the US) don't have breakfast but a "breakfast" to go good thing is that there is a denny´s 20m away where you can have a decent breakfast, and they even have a small pool and jacuzzi if you want to relax after a days walk in Disneyland.   Overall a very recommendable location.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay with us at the Best Western Plus Pavilions.  We are happy to hear you found our hotel and location helpful to your travels.  As you stayed we are just a short walk to the Anaheim Convention Center as well as Disneyland.  We hope to see you on future trips to the Anaheim area.  Thank you again.

Summary Heading: A poor example of a "resort motel"
Summary: This property is older and seems to be showing it's age. The staff are not professionals. The lobby is cramped with only one window to handle incoming and outgoing customers. The water temperature fluctuates wildly during use.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay with us at the Best Western Plus Pavilions.  I apologize we did not exceed your expectations and you were not happy with your stay.  Here at the Pavilions we take customer service very highly and I will be speaking to our staff to ensure each guest is getting the attention they deserve.  Thank you very much for your feed back and if you would like to speak to us regarding your complaints please call us directly at 714-776-0140.  Once again I apologize that you were not satisfied with your stay.

Summary Heading: Only place to stay if your going to Disneyland
Summary: This hotel was perfect for our stay at Disneyland.  The rooms were great and the staff was very pleasant.  The pool and the hot tub were a great way to relax after a long days of walking and the location of the hotel was great.  I would definitely stay here again next time we visit this area.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay with us at the Best Western Plus Pavilions and your review.  We are happy you found our location helpful and your pool enjoyable.  Here at the Pavilions we take customer service quite serious and we are please we met your expectations.  We hope to see you on future trips to the Anaheim area.  Thank you again.

Summary Heading: great hotel with only minor issues.
Summary: Great hotel, somewhat pricey but has most of what you need when travelling. Dennys restaurant right in front carpark, good sized pool, free grab n go snack breakfast items. Staff seemed ok, bed sheets were a bit old/threadbare and elevator was broken so we had to struggle with our luggage up 2 flights. Free parking and wifi was a bonus for us. Comfy beds and heaps of channel choice on tv when back in hotel to rest ha!
Manager Response: Thank you very much for staying with us at the Best Western Plus Pavilions.  We are happy you found our location helpful and pool enjoyable during your stay.  We are currently building our elevator and is scheduled to open in the next week, we are so excited.  Thank you again for your feedback and we hope to see you on future trips to the Anaheim area.

Summary: I looked through the reviews before writing this one.  Don't see others mentioning the concern I now have about the place.  I have stayed at this hotel a few times with no concerns and stayed there last Friday night on the 2nd floor.  A two inch cockroach was happily running around in the bathroom early Sat. morning until it was flushed.    When I checked out I told the receptionist about it.  She was polite but, 1st she suggested it was likely not a roach, but a water bug.  I told her I lived in SoCal and knew what roaches look like as they live outside in most yards.  Then she asked if I had a picture.  Really???  Does she take a phone or camera in the bathroom?  Is her 1st thought when seeing a roach to get a picture instead of killing it???  Sorry, but it was still kicking
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your recent stay with us at the Best Western Plus Pavilions and for your feedback. I only wish our efforts/compensation at check out had alleviated your concerns prior to your departure. At this time I would like to apologize on behalf of our entire team for not handling the situation to your complete satisfaction, and I will be sharing your comments with our staff. Once again I would like to apologize for not meeting your expectations during this stay.

Summary: We stayed at a hotel close to Disneyland and it provided us with everything we needed.  Even though the hotel was older it was very good.  We did expect more in the way of breakfast and the room had a strong cleaning odor smell.  Other than that it was satisfactory  and the staff was very helpful.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay with us at the Best Western Plus Pavilions.  We are happy to hear you enjoyed our Grab and Go Breakfast Snack and found our staff friendly.  We hope to see you again on future trips to the Anaheim area.  Thank you again.

Summary: Worked great for us walking to Disneyland.  Any of the hotels are a LONG walk, even if they say main gate.  We would stay there again.  Clean, serviceable and you can see the fireworks at Disneyland from the upper balcony.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying at the Best Western Plus Pavilions.  We are thrilled to hear you found our location helpful during your stay.  We hope to see you on future trips to Disneyland and the Anaheim area.  Thank you again.

Summary: We got to the hotel around 10am we knew we couldn't get into the room but we wanted a full day in the park so I paid signed all the papers and told them we'd be back when parks were closed to pick up the key. Well I booked for my husband and I and got 2 doubles. Also when I checked in the lady asked me do u want upstairs or downstairs I said upstairs but we got downstairs. Why even ask? And for all the guest checking in today I'm sure we were one of the first ones to do so, so why did we get left overs.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay and I would like to apologize for the misunderstanding.  I would like to assure you that your business is appreciated and we listen to all feed back.  I hope our voicemail finds you well and you except our apology.  We have already issued the compensation as discussed on the voicemail.  Please contact us direct if you have any other concerns.  Thank you again for allowing us to try to correct the problem.

Summary: Comfortable, convienient to local attractions. Now I need to write 200 characters, minimum. Nice place. Nice place. Still not 200 characters minimum. Dennys right next door. Nice place. Still not 200 characters minimum. Disneyland is right across the street. Honda Center is nearby. $20 cab ride (including tip)
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay with us at the Best Western Plus Pavilions and for your review which made me smile.  We are happy you enjoyed yourself and look forward to seeing you next time.  Thank you again.

Summary Heading: Best Western PLUS Pavilions, Anaheim, CA
Summary: This is a very good hotel to stay.  Friendly staff, very clean rooms.  The bed are very comfortable.  Close to very good resturants .  The locations of the hotel is great because it is close to Disneyland and not that far from Knotts Berry Farm.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay with us at the Best Western Plus Pavilions.  We are thrilled you enjoyed your stay and we hope to see you on future trips to the Anaheim area.  Thank you again.

Summary Heading: Super Easy Walk to Disneyland, Great place!
Summary: We stayed here for two nights on our recent Disneyland trip, we are annual pass holders that come to Anaheim once a month from 4 hours away.  The lobby staff was great, room was excellent and had all the amenities you need. It has a Denny's next door, a liquor store for booze after a long hard day at Disney with all 5 of my kids and here's the best part, you can walk across the street, through the Cast Member Parking lot (that is open 24 hrs) and walk right into downtown Disney. We just got on the Monorail and rode it into Tommorowland!!  I have stayed at lots of hotels all around the area and I was totally happy with this one. Two thumbs up! Will stay here every time, you beat the crowds on Harbor Blvd and have all you need right there.
Manager Response: Thank you for stay with us at the Best Western Plus Pavilions and your review.  We are happy you found our location and rooms helpful during your stay.  As you mentioned we are in walking distance to the Parks, Restaurants and the mini mart.  We look forward to seeing you on your future trips to the Anaheim area.

Summary: We usually stay at the Stovall's, but decided to stay at the Pavillions.  Very clean room, nice size for two people.  When we checked in I had a Military voucher.  But I incorrectly put the wrong reservation number on the voucher.  The two ladies working the front desk explained to us what was wrong.  They honored my original reservation at the voucher price.  Awesome!  We walked across the street to Disneyland and had a wonderful time.  Would highly recommend this for Military families as the MWR had vouchers.  Thanks for the great time!  The only downside was that the air-conditioner was very loud...but we were so tired it didn't matter!
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay with us at the Best Western Plus Pavilions.  We are happy to hear you enjoyed your room and our location.  We look forward to seeing you on future trips to the Anaheim area.  Thank you again.

Summary: We stayed at the Best Western Pavilions for 6 nights just 4 days ago and we were very happy with our stay. The rooms were very clean and perfect for a place to stay when heading to Disneyland.  The pool was exceptionally clean and we enjoyed it everyday that we were there as well as the hot tub which was also very clean and well kept up. We also had the grab and go breakfast every morning which put something in our stomachs before we left for the day, it was very helpful.  The staff were very friendly and helpful, we had a blow-dryer in our room that did not work well and when we told them they replaced it immediately. We were able to lay in bed and watch the fireworks in Disneyland which was really cool. The Wi-Fi also worked really well.    We never took the ART transit that
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay with us at the Best Western Plus Pavilions and your review.  We are thrilled to know you found so many things about our hotel helpful including the staff, location, Grab and Go Breakfast, and the view of the fireworks from your room.  We look forward to seeing you on future trips to the Anaheim area.  Thank you again.

Summary: A sad excuse for a Best Western...in no way a plus, rather a minus as the rooms are tiny and obsolete with only the bare minimum of refurbishment...needs a genuine remodeling, not just paint and wallpaper....better yet, tear it down and start over.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay with us and I want to apologize if we did not meet your standards.  We do take all reviews and comments seriously and will look into your concerns.

Summary: I have stayed at this hotel many times in the past and love it.  It's clean.  Has a friendly staff.  I can park right by my room.  The clientele is good.  For the most part my experience has been great.   Was down in Anaheim on September 19th and was going to spend the night.  This is my go to place since I was priced out of the Del Sol,  so I go here now.  Anyway I walked in and got my room.  For AAA they had a choice of a two double room for $98.10 or a double queen room for $103.10.  I chose the latter because my twins would have to share a bed.  More room for them.  I asked about the price for another night.  I was told the rate would be the same AAA $103.10.  Ok, I will let you know by tomorrow morning if I will need another night.   The check in staff were great.   Next
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay with us at the Best Western Plus Pavilions and thank you for taking our phone call yesterday to discuss the issue during your stay.  We are glad we were able to resolve the communication error and offer you compensation.  The compensation has already been applied to your Best Western Rewards account. We are pleased you have agreed to stay with us again on future trips to the Anaheim area.  If you should have any other concerns please do not hesitate to contact us direct.  Once again thank you for taking time out of your day to let us resolve the issue and restore your faith in us.

Summary Heading: Close to lots of local attractions
Summary: Perfect location, short walks to Disneyland, Denny's, shops and many more. Bed was very comfortable and rooms were very clean but they should have better showers at the hotel.Staff we're very nice and I liked it how each morning you could get free yoghurt, juice and granola bars at the reception, and also you can see the fireworks at Disneyland each night.I would happily stay at this hotel again.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us at the Best Western Plus Pavilions and for your review.  We are pleased you found our location helpful as well as our beds comfortable.  Customer Service is a priority at the Pavilions and we are thrilled you received friendly service.  We look forward to seeing you on future trips to the Anaheim area.

Summary: Good location, easy walk to the park and the ART stops right infront of the hotel. Denny's and the Wonderland mart are on either side so lots of options for food outside the park. Room was big and it was nice to have a fridge.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay with us at the Best Western Plus Pavilions.  As you know location is everything and we have a great one.  Being a short distance to restaurants, shopping and of course both Disneyland Parks.  We look forward to seeing you on future trips to the Anaheim area.

Summary Heading: cheaper than others near disney, can walk to disney
Summary: Generally the hote was fine. you can walk tot he park or conference center, which is great.  the showers were not excellent - they should improve those.  the staff were nice. You can hear the fireworks from disney, but otherwise quiet.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay with us at the Best Western Plus Pavilions.  We take great pride in our customer service and we are happy you enjoyed your stay with us and our location.  We look forward to seeing you on your next trip to the Anaheim area.

Summary: The hotel experience overall was great! The beds were comfortable and the staff very friendly. They were working on the outside of the hotel, making some upgrades while we stayed there. The only thing I would change is the water pressure in the showers and the air conditioner was very loud.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay with us at the Best Western Plus Pavilions.  We are happy to hear you enjoyed our location and our beds.  We look forward to seeing you on your next trip to the Anaheim area.

Summary: Nice and clean place. Walking distance to Disneyland, there is a bus stop just outside if you don't want to walk. The room was clean and comfortable. I had a room in the back of the building (no view for Fireworks) and slow Wifi but was ok for me (ask for a room near the main office for better connectivity). Grab & Go breakfast is just a starter, with coffe - granola bar - orange juice, you will need something else soon later. Room has a good fridge and microwave. Wifi and Parking included in the rate.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay with us at the Best Western Plus Pavilions.  We are pleased to know you enjoyed your stay and found our rooms clean and location helpful.  We look forward to seeing you on your next trip to the Anaheim area.

Summary: Really liked this hotel, very clean, staff were always very helpful and a great location. The pool was always clean and never too many people in there which was nice. Great location, enjoyed our morning and nightly walks to disneyland, takes around 15 mins to get there. Ate at Denny's quite often which was located right next to the hotel and was great having the free childrens meals on offer from the hotel. I would definitely stay here again :)
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay with us at the Best Western Plus Pavilions.  We are pleased you enjoyed your stay.  We look forward to seeing you on your next trip to the Anaheim area.

Summary: We stayed at BWPavilions on a short Disney trip.  The hotel is close to the park, bus service out the front door (great after a whole day in the park) and it is also within energetic walking distance.  The room was clean and comfortable, both a microwave and refrigerator a plus. It isn't the Ritz but felt like it to us! The staff were all so friendly and helpful, always with a smile for any request.  We will definitely be staying here again, it's a gem for a small price.
Manager Response: Thank you kindly for the warm review.  Here at the Best Western Plus Pavilions we value customer service and we are thrilled to know you had an enjoyable stay.  We thank you for your recent stay and we look forward to see you on your next trip to the Anaheim area.

Summary: Disneyland is an easy 15 minute walk or take the shuttle which stops in front of the hotel.   The staff is friendly, beds are comfortable and room is satisfactorily clean.  An Italian restaurant called Marri's is in the next parking lot over - a good place to carb up if you're in Anaheim for a Disney race. As other reviewers noted, the A/C is quite noisy.  If you need absolute silence to sleep, you should bring ear plugs with you.  I was satisfied with my stay and will be returning in just a few months!
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay with us at the Best Western Plus Pavilions.  As you know location is everything and we do have a great location.  We are pleased you found the location and restaurants in the area helpful.  We look forward to seeing you on your next trip to the Anaheim area.  Thank you again.

Summary: Easy five to ten minute walk to Disneyland. Nice pool, clean rooms and excellent air conditioning. Fairly quiet and served by Anaheim rapid transit. Great place to stay off property. Plenty of options to eat all with in an easy walk from your room.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay with us at the Best Western Plus Pavilions.  We are pleased to know  you found our location and property helpful during your stay and we look forward to seeing you on your next trip to the Anaheim area.

Summary: Very easy walk to Downtown Disney and Disneyland.  We like to stay here when doing the Disneyland Half Marathon since it's an easy walk to the start and finish of the race.  Not much of a breakfast included, but there is a restaurant right next door.
Manager Response: Congratulations on running in the  Marathon and thank you for your recent stay.  We are happy to hear our location is helpful to you during your stays here in Anaheim while running in the marathon. We look forward to seeing you during future races.  Thank you again.

Summary: The staff is always very nice and helpful.  We come often and always stay here.  They don't charge for parking as does other hotels in the area. They have a Denny's right next door and couple other places to eat within walking distance.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay with us at the Best Western Plus Pavilions.   We are happy to hear we can be your home away from home while you are in the Anaheim area and we look forward to seeing you on your next visit.

Summary: I rated this hotel "excellent" for reasons other than just the hotel. Although the Hotel was impeccably clean and nice, with everything in working order, the reason we stay there every time we're in Anaheim, is that it's right across the street from Disneyland, close to Knott's Berry Farm, etc. Also, in the same parking lot is a Denny's Restaurant, which is very handy in the morning when heading out for entertainment. Best Western Pavillion's is older, but considering that is in wonderful condition, with a great staff and all working amenities, no to mention a comfortable bed, and very clean bathrooms and such. Not too much noise - even considering it's located right on a very busy boulevard. Nice stay for singles, couples or even families! Would recommend to anyone whose not
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your recent stay with us and your glowing review.  We are thrilled you are a return guest and think of us each time you visit Anaheim.  Thank you again for your business and we look forward to seeing you again on your next trip to the Anaheim area.

Summary: We were there for the park across the street, about 15 minutes walk to get in. The staff was nice and helpful, the room was in need of a refresh. Noisy air conditioning, terrible smell in the room. The bathroom was small
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay with us at the Best Western Plus Pavilions.  I am happy to hear you found our location and staff helpful during your stay and I apologize if the room did not exceed your expectations.  I hope on your next visit we can rectify your concerns.  Thank you again.

Summary: Have been here many time. only one time did we have a problem, but itwas jus rude people above and we never call the front desk about it( they told us when we were checking out to ALWAYS call and let them know) . rooms are nice, bed comfortable and the place is clean and right down the street to Dsineyland!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for making us your home away from home on your visits to the Anaheim area.  We are thrilled you enjoyed your stay and we look forward to seeing you on your next trip to Anaheim.

Summary: Bed Sags, Check in Guys awesome , Check out Girls give Attitude, Don't ask for a receipt on check out you will get Attitude and eyes rolled,  Parking is unsecure But Room are Clean, GM called from a Private Number and when you try and call back front Desk Hang up on you.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Just got back from a week long stay. Fantastic hotel! Only a 15 minute walk from the parks. We walked across the street thru the parking lot and then thru the grand californian(it is has an open breezeway for easy public access into either downtown disney(which leads to disneyland) or to california adventure. Front desk was great! - they got me into a room with the correct number of beds as my reservation did not indicate initially. Room was awesome! Clean with a super-clear widescreen flat-screen tv with tons of timewarner channels(several hbo's, espn's, science, local, etc.. channels I have never ever seen delivered in other hotels - I felt like I was at home but better, lol.) Grab and go breakfast was awesome(saved me money:-)) Free newspapers. Pool was clean and
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your recent stay with us at the Best Western Plus Pavilions.  We are thrilled you enjoyed your stay and found the location, Grab and Go Breakfast Snack and hot tub useful.  We look forward to seeing you on your next trip to the Anaheim area.

Summary: This room was bad in condition that I almost left and get another room somewhere else but my wife talked me into staying. Bathtub did not drained properly and it was not cleaned. The remote had bad batteries and the carpet was so badly stained that we worn out flip flops inside the room.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay with us at the Best Western Plus Pavilions.  I do apologize we were not able to meet your expectations.  I hope you give us another opportunity on your next trip to the Anaheim area.

Summary: My family and I visited from England for two weeks at the end of July and we had a wonderful stay. The rooms were big- we had the Queen suite which consists of two rooms with a moveable partition and four huge beds. We were on the top floor and found it very quiet and pleasant. The lovely housekeeping staff always did a wonderful job each day and we loved coming back to a clean, tidy room - they always put the air con on for us too so it was bliss. The carpets, admittedly, have probably seen better days but we didn't find them to be unclean, just a bit old and tired. The bathrooms and sink areas were absolutely spotless every day we stayed. We would definitely return- the Denny's next door and the short walk across the car park opposite straight into Downtown Disney were both
Manager Response: We are so pleased to read your review, thank you.  We are happy you found the suite and our location helpful during your stay and look forward to seeing  you on your next to the Anaheim area.

Summary Heading: OK, but very noisy air conditioner/fan
Summary: Room was clean and functional (had a king bed on the ground floor). Sufficient parking to be near our room door (it's a motel). Included breakfast was box juice, coffee, and granola bars (no Decaf coffee though).   Air conditioner (required because room was warm and stuffy) was very noisy -- hard to hear the TV or have a conversation.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us at the Best Western Plus Pavilions.  We look forward to seeing you on your next trip to the Anaheim area.

Summary Heading: TERRIBLE is too nice of a word
Summary: We stayed here for one night through Hotwire and that was too many.  While the staff was pleasant, this hotel needs a major facelift.  The room was very cramped and the air circulation was poor.  The carpets turned our feet black to the point that we wore our shoes except when we were sleeping  and the next morning when we went to shower, there were dead gnats in the tub.  Gross.  The walls are paper thin, so we heard every conversation from the room next door.  We didn't go to the pool, so I can't review that.  From a distance, it looked OK, but you never know up close.  There isn't an elevator, so if you have tons of luggage or have a problem with stairs, request a first floor room.  We had a second floor room and were able to go out and watch the Disneyland fireworks.  The
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay with us and I do apologize we were not able to meet your expectations.

Summary: I admire the very good staff service of this hotel. Everyone is friendly. The room accommodation was average. Breakfast items need some improvement. Please add some muffins and/or danish pastries, etc.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your recent stay and your kind review.  I might be bias however I do feel we have a great staff as well.  We look forward to seeing you on your next trip to Anaheim.

Summary: We arrived after a long drive to an amazing front desk staff. They were fast and kind getting us checked in. We went straight up to our room which was clean with great comfortable beds! Got Denny's to go which is right next door & perfect after a long day then hit the pool with our kids. The water was warm & the pool area was clean. Plenty of parking, so close to disney in a great location. You guys are amazing! This is our last short family trip before my husbands leaves for Afghanistan. We're all under a lot of stress and even the simple things like a pleasant staff make our day to day life easier. Your military rate is wonderful, we thank you!  & look forward to the next few nights here before heading back to reality. We'll be seeing you again soon to celebrate dad's home
Manager Response: We are so pleased you enjoyed your recent stay with us at the Best Western Plus Pavilions and that we were able to help with a little stress relief.  Thank you very much for your service.

Summary: Carpets were filthy. Our feet turned black. We had to vacate the rooms for 5 hours for motel work. Shower problems in one room and TV problems in another. The refrigerators barely cooled our items.This is not a BW Plus motel. We would not go back. Manager did discount our stay but the damage was more than could be made up. Ruined our family vacation.
Manager Response: I would like to apologize for not meeting your expectations during your recent stay with us.

Summary: I was leery of a hotel with exterior corridors. This one was safe and I sat on the bench by the entrance and watched Disney fireworks each night. The beds were nice and comfortable. The daily maid service was excellent. This is a good location for families going to Disney as it was directly across the street. The staff was very accommodating and put us on the first floor as requested since many in our party were above 80 years old or had medical issues. Thanks a million.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us at the Best Western Plus Pavilions.  We look forward to your return once our elevator is complete.

Summary Heading: Great service - nice accomodations and very affordable
Summary: My sister and I booked the Best Western Pavilion in Anaheim for a 7 night stay to visit Disney. We were more than pleased with the accommodations and service.  Comfortable beds, spacious parking (free) Outstanding service by employees and so reasonably priced.
